3. Mick forces Alison to admit that she slept with him, which causes Casey to become enraged. Mick then reveals that he and Alison's mother, Barbara, were lovers in the past. Casey becomes increasingly agitated and threatens to kill Mick when he is released.
4. Emily, Paul, Barbara, and Henry are trying to escape from Mick, who has gone to confront Alison and Casey. Emily is worried about leaving Casey and Alison behind, but Henry points out that Casey is strong and that he didn't tie the rope as tightly as he could have.
5. Alison tries to reason with Mick and convince him to let Casey and her go. Casey, still reeling from the revelation that Alison slept with Mick, struggles with his feelings and tries to process what has happened.
6. The standoff ends with Mick being shot by the police and Alison running to his side. Casey is left to deal with the aftermath of Alison's betrayal and the events of the day.

1. Brad and Katie are trying to conceive a baby through artificial insemination with Henry and Vienna's help. Henry has doubts about the process, but Vienna assures him that she is committed to it. The procedure is unsuccessful at first, but they try again and are hopeful that it will work.
2. Luke is feeling lost and unsure about his future after dropping out of college. His grandmother, Lucinda, is undergoing radiation therapy for an illness and is disappointed in her body. Lily, Luke's mother, takes over a meeting for Luke's foundation and does a great job, leading Luke to ask her to become the new administrator.
3. Brian, a former employee of Luke's foundation, stops by to visit Lucinda and they have a heart-to-heart conversation. Brian reveals that he is still attracted to men, but is not ready to come out publicly. Lucinda is understanding and tells him that she considers him a friend.
4. Noah is proud of Luke for standing up for what he believes in at the foundation meeting. Luke decides to go back to work for the foundation and Noah is happy to see him getting back to his old self. Brad, Katie, Henry, and Vienna celebrate after the procedure and pray for a successful pregnancy.

1. Jennifer, who is pregnant, is getting married to Mike next week. Her mother, Barbara, is excited about the wedding and offers to handle all the planning. Jennifer is unsure about having a big wedding, but eventually agrees to let her mother take charge.
2. Will, who has been a good friend to Celia, spends the night at Alison's place after she gets robbed. Celia suspects that Will is playing Alison and trashing her apartment to make himself look like a hero. She tells Alison about her suspicions, but Alison has already decided to end her friendship with Will because she feels that it is too much for her to handle.
3. Holden confronts Lily about Keith, who has moved onto their property. Holden is concerned about Keith's debt and the fact that a man with a gun is looking for him. Lily defends Keith and introduces him to Holden. Keith explains that the man with the gun is an old friend and a pilot, and that he carries a gun because of his job.
4. Jack offers to check Keith out for Holden, but Holden declines, saying that he doesn't want to risk losing J.J. Jack advises Holden to check his feelings for Lily, as it could be jealousy that is driving his concern for the kids.
5. At a dance contest, Margo and Tom win the trophy. Holden and Lily run into each other, and Holden confronts Lily about Keith. Lily tells Holden that she is trying to move on and have fun. Meanwhile, Keith is confronted by a man with a gun who is looking for him because of his debt.

1. Katie and Brad are expecting a baby, and they are excited about it. However, Katie fainted due to high blood pressure, and the doctor advised her to take bed rest to avoid complications like preeclampsia.
2. Paul and Rosanna are on the run with Meg's baby, Eliza. They stopped at a diner to feed Eliza, and Paul tried to get a job to earn money for food and car repair.
3. Kim, the producer of the reality show, offered Brad his old job back, and Vienna agreed to co-host the show with him to keep it going. Henry, Vienna's husband, is not happy about it.
4. Katie is in the hospital, and Henry visited her with flowers. He is worried about Katie's health and the possibility of losing the baby.
5. Bonnie and Dusty are searching for Paul and the baby. Bonnie is not feeling well, but Dusty insists on continuing the search.
6. Brad and Vienna are preparing for their test show. Kim is unsure about their chemistry, but they are determined to make it work.
7. Henry is jealous of Brad and Vienna's partnership, and he expressed his concerns to Vienna. However, Vienna reassured him that it is only work and that she still loves him.

1. Bonnie left some items in Dusty's car, and he returns them to her. They discuss a mysterious item that Bonnie left in the glove compartment, and Dusty tells Bonnie that he needs to apologize to Meg for interfering in her life.
2. Damian and Meg talk about Paul's visitation rights with Eliza. Meg expresses her exhaustion and says that she can't focus on anything but Eliza. Damian tells Meg that she's doing the right thing by giving Paul another chance.
3. Bonnie and Dusty continue to discuss the mysterious item that Bonnie left in Dusty's car. They laugh and joke about it, and Dusty mentions that he needs to apologize to Meg.
4. Rosanna and Paul talk about their past relationship and how much they've both changed. Paul tells Rosanna that he's glad they're friends, and Rosanna says that she's staying with him until she can find a job and a place of her own.
5. Bonnie gives Dusty advice about apologizing to Meg and tells him to bring flowers. Derek interrupts them and asks about the items that Bonnie left in Dusty's car.
6. Paul talks to Rosanna about finding a job and getting her money back from Craig. Rosanna tells Paul that she doesn't want the money back and that she's happy with her simpler life.
7. Meg and Dusty talk about Paul's visitation rights with Eliza. Dusty tells Meg that she's making a mistake, but Meg insists that she's doing what's best for Eliza.
8. Craig talks to Rosanna about Carly and how she's pushing him away. Craig asks Rosanna to call a temporary truce for Carly's sake, but Rosanna refuses.
9. Carly and Rosanna talk about Craig and how he's the only person who doesn't make Carly feel like a loser. Rosanna tells Carly that she's starting to trust Paul, and Carly expresses her skepticism.

1. Barbara, Holden, Dusty, and Margo are searching for Lily and Rose, who are trapped in a well. They learn that James Steinbeck, Lily's ex-husband, may have knowledge of a hunting lodge with a well on the property. Susan, an ex-wife of a hunter, confirms that there is a well on the property of a hunting lodge she used to visit with her ex-husband. Margo believes that Lily and Rose are at this location.

2. Meanwhile, a wedding is taking place between Carly and Jack. The wedding is Native American-themed and is being officiated by Hannah. Various characters, including Craig, Rosanna, Molly, and Katie, offer their blessings and thoughts during the ceremony. After the ceremony, Carly reveals to Jack that she has something to tell him, implying that she may be pregnant with his child.

1. Lily has a nightmare about Ethan being trapped in a hole, but Holden reassures her that they all worked together to save him.
2. Emma, Alison, and Aaron return home to find that Ethan has been trapped in a hole for days. They are worried about his condition, but Holden and Lily are relieved to hear that he is alive.
3. Henry is tied to a chair and being held captive by Derek, who is working for James Stenbeck. Henry demands to be released, but Derek refuses until James gives the order.
4. Bonnie and Vienna are trapped in a warehouse and are trying to find food to eat. They argue over whether to eat with their hands or wait for silverware.
5. Paul is down in the hole with Ethan, helping the rescue team to get him out. Holden and Lily are relieved to hear his voice, and Mike is surprised to hear that Paul is down there.
6. Henry finds Bonnie and Vienna in the warehouse and helps them to escape. They are grateful, but Bonnie is suspicious of Derek's motives.
7. James Stenbeck calls Barbara and tells her that Paul is down in the hole. Barbara is worried, but James assures her that he will be fine.
8. Paul is successfully rescued from the hole, and he is reunited with Meg. James tells Meg that he needs an heir and asks her to sign a document giving him custody of her child.
9. In the next episode, Aaron is concerned about Alison's behavior, Lily begs Jack not to leave, and Meg is shocked by what she sees.

1. Janet is looking for Liberty, who is not in her room. Jack suggests that she might have spent the night elsewhere, and Janet wonders if she should call the police.
2. Liberty is having breakfast with Paul and Emily at Fairwinds. She mentions that she had a good night's sleep and that the bed in the guest room is very comfortable.
3. Janet is worried about Liberty and wants to call her, but she is afraid that Liberty won't answer if she is still mad at her. Jack encourages her to call and reassures her that if Liberty answers, she will know that she was worrying for nothing.
4. Margo and Tom are getting ready to go to a hearing for Adam. Margo is worried about Adam, but Tom reassures her that everything will be okay.
5. Adam is at the courthouse, waiting for his hearing to start. He sees Alison and talks to her before the hearing.
6. Casey is worried about Maddie testifying for Adam and tries to talk her out of it. Maddie accuses him of emotional blackmail and leaves.
7. Janet is upset that Liberty has spent the night at Paul and Emily's and wants her to come home. Emily suggests that Liberty move in with them until she gives birth, which Janet strongly opposes.
8. The hearing for Adam starts, and Maddie is called as a witness. However, she does not show up, and the hearing is postponed. Adam goes to find Maddie and talks her into testifying.

1. Carly is dealing with a brain tumor diagnosis and is scared that everything will become too emotional for her. Parker, her son, is determined to find a way to save her life and has been researching experimental treatments. He finds a clinic in Berlin with a new kind of treatment, but it would cost hundreds of thousands of dollars and take up all of Carly's remaining time. Parker offers to use his trust fund to pay for the treatment, but Carly refuses and tells him to go to school.

2. Colonel Mayer, Noah's father, has done a complete turnaround and accepted Noah for who he is. He wants to make amends with Luke and his family, and Holden invites him to join them for a family dinner. Meanwhile, Rosanna has been lying about her memory recovery in order to protect Craig from going back to prison. She confesses to Paul and apologizes, but he is unsure about moving forward with their wedding plans due to her incomplete recovery.

1. Chris has returned to Oakdale and is working at Memorial Hospital, but his father, Bob, is not giving him enough credit for his experience and accomplishments. Chris and his girlfriend, Emily, get into an argument with Bob about his lack of support for Chris's ideas and projects.
2. Jack and Carly are planning to get married, but Carly wants a bigger wedding than Jack is comfortable with. She wants to include as much family as possible and make the day special, while Jack wants to keep it small and simple.
3. Kim, Tom, and Nancy are happy to have Chris back in Oakdale and want him to feel welcome. They try to convince Bob to be more supportive of Chris and his ideas, but Bob is hesitant. Chris and Emily discuss the challenges of dealing with their parents and their high expectations.

1. Liam is waiting for Steffy to meet him for a special dinner, but she is late and hasn't returned his calls. He becomes frustrated and decides to take Bill's jet out of town. Steffy eventually arrives and learns that Liam has left.
2. Wyatt and Steffy finalize their divorce and have a laser remove their wedding bands. Wyatt tells Steffy that he loves her and always will.
3. Ridge and Quinn have a conversation about their new understanding and respect for each other. Ridge agrees to keep Quinn's secret and not tell Eric about their past actions.
4. Katie and Ivy discuss Quinn's behavior and Katie mentions that she has been spending time with Eric while Quinn is away. Ivy is unsure if Quinn knows about this.

1. Rick and Steffy are in a relationship, but Stephanie knows about it and is against it. She has been spying on them and overheard their conversation. Stephanie wants them to end things, but Rick is not willing to do so because he loves Steffy too much. Steffy is worried that Stephanie will tell her father, Ridge, about their relationship.
2. Jackie has hired a new designer, who is revealed to be Bridget. Jackie and Bridget are discussing the new designs and how to present them to the public. Bridget is hesitant to be in the spotlight, but Jackie thinks it is necessary to create a backstory and persona for the new designer. Nick, Jackie's son, enters the room and meets Bridget, who introduces herself as "Madame X."

1. Nicole, Vivienne, and Maya are getting ready for Nicole's wedding to Zende. They comment on how thoughtful Zende has been with the preparations.
2. Zende's parents, Kristen and Tony, arrive at the wedding venue and are greeted by Eric and Quinn.
3. Pam and Charlie are preparing the food for the wedding, while Sally and Shirley are making wedding cakes. Sally has the idea to crash the Forrester wedding with the cakes to gain exposure for their fashion line.
4. Julius, Nicole's father, arrives and shares a heartfelt moment with his daughter.
5. The wedding party is gathered and waiting for the bride to walk down the aisle. Zende is feeling anxious, but Kristen reassures him.
6. Sasha, Nicole's half-sister, arrives and shares a moment with Nicole before the ceremony.
7. Carter, the officiant, begins the ceremony and expresses gratitude for the love between Zende and Nicole.
8. Nicole walks down the aisle with her father, and the couple exchanges vows.
9. After the ceremony, the guests congratulate the couple and share their well-wishes.
10. The wedding reception begins, and the guests enjoy food and drinks while celebrating the newlyweds.

1. Sally thought Wyatt wanted to go back to sleep when he said he wanted to stay in bed, but Wyatt clarified that he has been wide awake, looking at her.
2. Wyatt tells Sally that he needs to talk to her about something - his father, Bill Spencer, asked him to come back to work at Spencer Publications.
3. Meanwhile, Katie is upset because Thorne, her husband, left her and Will to go back to Paris. Bill, Katie's ex-husband, thinks it's a good thing as Will is the best part of his life and their future involves Katie.
4. Donna, Katie's sister, asks Katie how she is doing and if she still has feelings for Bill. Katie denies it and says she is just in shock that Thorne left her.
5. Bill tells Justin that he has reached out to Wyatt and practically begged him to come back to Spencer Publications. He wants his sons back in the company as it is their legacy.
6. Wyatt shows Sally a sketch of Spectra Fashions, a company that Bill destroyed. Wyatt wants to revive it and make things right for Sally.
7. Donna meets Justin in Bill's office and he asks her about Katie and Bill. Donna says she is concerned about their relationship.
8. Bill talks to Katie and Will about Thorne leaving. He compares it to a sports injury and suggests that they should stay away from the game for a little while.
9. Wyatt tells Sally that he wants to reclaim his position at Spencer Publications and believes that Sally can accomplish more on her own. He expresses his love and support for her.

1. Hope and Liam express their frustration with Steffy's behavior during their separation. Hope is upset that Steffy is intentionally making things difficult for them during the waiting period before their divorce is finalized, while Liam believes that Steffy needs protection from Rick, who he thinks is using her to get her to sign the annulment papers.
2. Katie organizes a dinner between the two families, including Ridge and Bill, to help improve their relationships. However, the conversation becomes tense when the topic of Hope and Liam's delayed marriage comes up. Bill expresses his disapproval of Hope and believes that Liam needs more experience before settling down.
3. Hope and Liam express their desire to be married and start their lives together. Liam suggests that they leave and start their lives at his place, but Hope ultimately decides to stay and wait for her mother and Ridge to return.

1. Nick asks Storm to be his attorney to handle the situation with Taylor, who wants to be alone with her son Jack but has been drinking again.
2. Taylor brings Jack to Rick's house and shares her plans to care for him, while Rick expresses his concerns about her emotional stability.
3. Phoebe and Ridge discuss Taylor and Nick's split, with Phoebe noticing that her mother seemed off after Jack's birth. Ridge assures her that Taylor is getting better.
4. Nick and Brooke discuss the custody arrangement for Jack, with Nick expressing his worry about Taylor's emotional stability and alcohol consumption.
5. Taylor asks Rick to check her house for any alcohol, as she wants to prove to Nick that she is not drinking.
6. Felicia approaches Ridge to discuss a plan to keep Eric from leaving after their parents' anniversary party, hoping to rekindle their parents' relationship.
7. Storm agrees to arrange an emergency custody hearing for Nick, who wants to ensure Jack's safety without completely taking away Taylor's parental rights.
8. Taylor receives the custody summons and suspects Brooke's involvement, vowing to fight for her child.
9. Nick and Brooke discuss the pain of losing custody, with Brooke empathizing with Taylor's situation.
10. Taylor calls Nick, expressing her disbelief and anger about the custody petition, blaming Brooke for her misfortunes.

1. Steffy and Liam notice that Bill is quiet and reflective during a visit with their daughter Kelly. Liam expresses his desire to spend more time with Beth, even though Hope has been generous with visitation rights.
2. Thomas tells Douglas that he and Zoe are getting married soon, which upsets Douglas. Thomas explains that he wants to give his son a "real family" again.
3. Steffy and Liam discuss the challenges of being separated from their respective partners and children. Liam expresses frustration about how Thomas' actions have affected his family.
4. Steffy encourages Liam not to let his negative feelings overwhelm him and to focus on the love he has for his daughters.
5. Thomas tells Vinny that he has proposed to Zoe and plans to marry her soon, which has upset Douglas. Vinny expresses skepticism about Thomas' plan.
6. Thomas shows Zoe two wedding gowns he has designed, one for her and one for Hope. He wants Hope to wear the gown on the "hope for the future" showstopper.
7. Hope is worried about Douglas, who is upset about Thomas and Zoe's impending marriage. Thomas dismisses her concerns and insists that everything will be fine once they are married.
8. Liam tells Hope that Thomas is manipulating her and Douglas in order to get her to marry him. He encourages her not to let Thomas get away with his manipulative behavior. Steffy confronts Thomas about his behavior and accuses him of trying to manipulate Hope into marrying him.

1. Ridge wants to buy a corner store from an elderly couple who have been in the neighborhood for 40 years, but Rick is hesitant because he feels it is not ethical to take advantage of the changing neighborhood.
2. Ridge and Rick have a disagreement about Stephanie's portrait, with Rick feeling manipulated by Ridge's actions.
3. Caroline is having a "girl's day" and Thomas stops by to talk to her. They discuss the revisions Thomas made to the swimwear line and Thomas mentions that he is trying to step up in every way he can.
4. Rick confronts Ridge about manipulating him, Eric, and Maya in order to get Stephanie's portrait in a place of prominence in the Forrester home.
5. Thomas expresses his excitement about the upcoming birth of his brother and his desire to be a role model for him. Caroline goes into labor and Thomas helps her time the contractions.
6. Ridge receives a phone call from Caroline telling him that she is in labor and he leaves to be with her.
7. Eric and Rick discuss the upcoming birth of Ridge's child and Eric mentions that it is a great day for the Forrester family. Rick expresses his frustration with Ridge's controlling behavior and Eric defends Ridge.
8. Ridge, Caroline, Thomas, and the midwife and doula discuss the progress of Caroline's labor and prepare for the birth.
9. Eric tries to change the subject and focus on the positive aspects of the upcoming birth, but Rick continues to express his anger towards Ridge.
10. Caroline is in active labor and Ridge, Thomas, and the midwife and doula encourage and support her as she prepares to give birth.

1. Steffy and Liam are preparing to leave for their wedding in Australia. Everyone is helping them pack and get ready. Quinn and Eric are in charge of the tickets and passports.
2. R.J. is staying behind and will be taking care of the house. Thomas stops by to say goodbye and invites Sally to his sister's wedding, but she declines.
3. On the plane, Brooke and Ridge are discussing their upcoming wedding. Brooke asks Ridge to get her another pillow.
4. Sally is trying to find a way to go to the wedding in Australia. Shirley and Saul are against the idea, but Sally is determined to go.
5. Ivy and Thomas are talking about the trip to Australia. Thomas mentions that he thought about bringing a date but decided not to.
6. Bill is sitting next to Katie on the plane and they are talking about Will and the upcoming wedding.
7. Brooke and Ridge are discussing their vows and Eric and Quinn are expressing their happiness about the wedding and the family being together.

1. Brooke and Bill are at the hospital, where Katie is being treated for heart failure. Katie's high white blood cell count suggests an infection, but the cause is unknown.
2. Taylor, a therapist, is at the hospital for a follow-up session with Katie. She is confused about Katie's absence and the presence of Brooke, Bill, and Will.
3. Donna confronts Brooke and Bill about their role in Katie's condition. She reveals that Katie went to Brooke's house to confront them about their relationship and had a car accident on the way home.
4. Brooke and Bill explain that they were meeting to discuss their issues with Katie when Brooke had a car accident. Bill was injured, so Brooke took him to her house. They hid Bill from Katie to avoid a scandal, as Katie would have been furious about Bill's drinking and driving.
5. Katie's doctor explains that her heart failure is due to myocarditis, an inflammation of the heart muscle. It could be caused by an infection or missed medication. Taylor, Katie's therapist, wonders if Katie missed her medication due to her distraction and agitation from Brooke and Bill's relationship.
6. Hope, Katie's niece, is at the hospital and expresses her love and concern for Katie. She mentions Katie's strength and resilience, which have helped her overcome past health issues.
7. Taylor confronts Bill about a bump on his head, suspecting he was in an accident. Bill denies any connection to Katie's condition, but Taylor vows to find out the truth.

1. Liam is excited about becoming a father and looks forward to receiving advice from Bill, who has experience raising his son, Will. Bill advises Liam to pay attention to his wife and make sure she knows how much he loves her.
2. Hope and Steffy have a tense encounter at the beach house. Hope tells Steffy that she is not dating Oliver, but Steffy points out that he still cares about her. Steffy leaves to meet Liam, but traffic is backed up due to an accident on PCH.
3. Brooke is upset and considers talking to Eric or Bill about it, but ultimately decides to talk to someone else first. Liam is eagerly awaiting Steffy's arrival for a barbecue, but she is stuck in traffic.
4. Thomas and Oliver invite Hope to go surfing with them, but she declines and chooses to stay behind. Steffy also declines the invitation and insists on making her way to Liam, even if it means sitting in traffic.
5. Hope expresses her feelings to Steffy, acknowledging that she is still angry and hurt but wants what's best for Steffy and Liam. She also expresses her hope for a better future for both of them.

1. Beth Logan, the mother of Brooke, Donna, and Katie, is dealing with memory problems that she believes may be early signs of dementia. Her daughters are trying to find ways to help her, such as recreating memorable family events and making a list of "Ways to bring Mom's memories back." However, Beth has made the decision to return to Paris, despite her family's objections.
2. Meanwhile, Donna's son Marcus is getting used to being a part of the Forrester family and working at Forrester Creations. He is aware that not everyone in the family is happy about his presence, but he is determined to work hard and prove himself.
3. Beth's husband, Stephen, is trying to convince her to stay in Los Angeles and not return to Paris. He reminds her of the wonderful memories they have shared with their daughters and grandchildren, and the impact she has had on their lives. He also points out that if things don't work out in Los Angeles, Paris will still be an option. Ultimately, Beth decides to stay and be with her family.

1. Brooke and Nick are stuck on Nick's boat due to fog, and Brooke asks Nick to watch her baby while she's away.
2. Macy and Deacon are discussing the possibility of getting married, despite Deacon's legal issues with Brooke.
3. Rick confronts Sally about Macy's relationship with Deacon, expressing concern for Macy's well-being.
4. Sally defends Deacon and Macy's relationship, stating that they are good for each other and that Macy deserves to make her own decisions.
5. Brooke and Nick share a meal and discuss their lives, with Nick expressing his desire to have five daughters.
6. Macy expresses hesitation about marrying Deacon due to the short amount of time they've known each other, but Deacon is confident in their relationship.
7. Nick and Brooke discuss their attraction to each other, but Brooke reveals that she sees Nick as a temporary distraction from her life at Forrester.
8. Nick and Brooke decide to sleep in separate beds for the night, both acknowledging their attraction to each other but recognizing their different paths in life.

1. Brooke has decided to step down as the spokeswoman for her clothing line, Brooke's bedroom, and wants her sister Donna to replace her. Donna is unsure if she can do it, but Brooke believes in her and promises to teach her.
2. Ridge is upset about Brooke's decision to quit modeling and is concerned about Donna's ability to replace her sister. He has also decided to stop designing for the Brooke's bedroom line.
3. Donna and Brooke have a conversation about Brooke's decision to give up modeling. Donna expresses her concern about Brooke's future with Ridge and believes that giving up modeling is a mistake.
4. Bridget and Dante discuss their recent pregnancy test results. Bridget is not pregnant, and Dante is disappointed. Bridget expresses her desire to focus on their relationship before starting a family.
5. Felicia confronts Dante about Bridget not being pregnant. Dante is upset and tells Felicia that Bridget wants him to be patient. Felicia advises Dante to wait and tells him that she will be there for him when he is ready.
6. Nick and Brooke have a conversation about Brooke's decision to quit modeling. Nick expresses his support for her, and they express their love for each other.

1. Felicia is upset with Nick for telling her mother that she has a drug habit, which Nick denies. Eric and Stephanie are also discussing a serious matter - Nick informed Stephanie that Felicia may have a drug problem.
2. Ridge and Felicia are discussing her strained relationship with their mother. Felicia mentions that Ridge is not at the top of their mother's list these days, to which Ridge agrees.
3. Thorne is being removed from Forrester Creations, and Darla is trying to reassure him that everything will be okay. Darla visited Stephanie and Eric the previous night to discuss the mistake she made by giving Sally the designs.
4. Ridge is having a meeting to discuss firing Thorne, who has a problem being a team player. Ridge reveals that Thorne issued an ultimatum to their parents - him or me.
5. Eric calls Thorne and asks him to bring Darla to the meeting where they will discuss Thorne's removal from the company. Stephanie and Felicia are also present, and Felicia agrees to talk to Thomas about the mystery girl he was seen kissing.
6. Ridge is confident about his abilities as a designer and believes that he has earned his position in the company. He is aware that Thorne is being voted out and is not worried about it.
7. Thorne and Darla meet with Stephanie and Eric to discuss the decision. Eric reveals that Thorne is not being removed from the company, and it is Ridge who will be leaving.

1. Donna Logan and Thorne Forrester's wedding is taking place, but Thorne calls it off during the ceremony after realizing that Donna's intentions for marrying him might not be pure. It is revealed that Donna's plan was to marry Thorne to get back at his mother, Stephanie.
2. Katie, Donna's sister, tells Thorne about Donna's plan, leading him to call off the wedding. Donna is upset with Katie for ruining her plan and her chance at happiness with Thorne.
3. Stephanie, Thorne's mother, is pleased that the wedding did not take place, as she had never approved of Donna for her son. Donna threatens Stephanie, saying that she will get her revenge someday.

1. Donna has returned from Paris to be with her husband, Eric, who has come out of his coma and is now at their home in a wheelchair.
2. However, Donna has been kicked out of the house by Eric's children after Eric saw her in a compromising position with her assistant, Owen.
3. Donna wants to explain what happened to Eric, but his children, led by Stephanie, are keeping her away and have even hired guards to prevent her from entering the house.
4. Donna seeks Brooke's help in reaching Eric, and Brooke suggests that Ridge might be able to help.
5. Meanwhile, Eric is surrounded by his children and Stephanie, who are determined to protect him from Donna and Pam.
6. Eric expresses his love for Stephanie and his family, and he wants to leave his past mistakes behind and move forward with them.

1. Deacon Shaw visits Hope Logan to apologize for missing her wedding and to offer his support after her recent separation from Liam Spencer. Hope tells Deacon that she is no longer married and that she is glad he is there for her. Deacon expresses regret for not being a better father to Hope and for contributing to the issues between her and Liam.
2. Thomas Forrester and Caroline Spencer discuss their work responsibilities while Rick Forrester is on his honeymoon. Thomas is involved in a photo shoot with Hope for the Hope for the Future line, which Rick praises. Caroline expresses concern about the nature of the photos, but Rick assures her that it is just business.
3. Liam Spencer meets with his father, Bill Spencer, to discuss business. Katie Logan tries to encourage Liam to visit Hope, but he is focused on work. Bill praises Liam for moving on from Hope and encourages him to be a strong Spencer.
4. Deacon and Hope discuss the events that led to her separation from Liam. Hope explains that Liam found a note that Deacon left for her and misunderstood the situation, leading him to turn to Steffy Forrester. Deacon expresses regret for not staying to explain the situation to Liam.
5. Rick and Caroline discuss their future at Forrester Creations. Rick is motivated to preserve his father's legacy, while Caroline encourages him to create his own. Rick and Caroline share a kiss, and Rick expresses his excitement about being in charge.

1. Thorne is surprised by his parents' support and recognition of his work. Eric offers him a gift of his latest collection and asks him to return to Forrester Creations.
2. Thorne expresses his doubts about Ridge's reaction, but Eric is confident that Ridge will get over it.
3. Stephanie and Eric express their love for Thorne and apologize for not showing their support sooner.
4. Ridge prepares to leave town for business and discusses the challenges of managing five children with Brooke.
5. Thomas and Amber meet in secret, expressing their love and desire for privacy.
6. Caitlin informs Stephanie about Amber's new job at Insomnia, where Thomas frequently visits, raising concerns about their relationship.
7. Darla and Thorne discuss the recent reconciliation between Thorne and his parents, and Thorne expresses his desire to return to Forrester Creations under different circumstances.
8. Ridge and Brooke share a heartfelt goodbye before Ridge's departure.
9. Thomas brings food for Amber during her break, but they are interrupted by Stephanie's arrival.
10. Stephanie confronts Amber about her relationship with Thomas, warning her to stay away from her grandson.

1. Bill, Liam's father, is concerned about Liam's engagement to Hope. He thinks that Hope is not fully committed to the marriage and is using Liam only when it suits her.
2. Hope is under the impression that Liam is at a bachelor party, but in reality, Bill has organized a sophisticated and boring party for him at Sunset L.A.
3. Steffy, who has feelings for Liam, believes that Hope does not appreciate Liam and is determined to end their engagement. She thinks that Liam deserves better treatment and should be with her instead.
4. Hope has broken a promise to Liam regarding their wedding date, but she plans to explain everything to him and reassure him that their commitment to each other is more important than the wedding ceremony.
5. Liam is unsure about his feelings towards Hope after she broke her promise. He is also feeling the pressure from his father, who wants him to end the engagement.
6. Bill asks Steffy to drive Liam home from the party and to help him end the engagement. Steffy agrees and goes to Sunset L.A.
7. Liam is uncomfortable with the situation and tells Steffy that he loves Hope and plans to marry her. Steffy offers to spend the night with him, but he declines.

1. Bridget reveals to Nick that she is pregnant with his child, which could potentially end his marriage to Brooke. Nick is determined to find a way to make it work and is hopeful that Brooke will understand and accept the situation.
2. Shane, a homeless man who knows that Taylor was responsible for Darla's death, is causing tension and worry for Taylor and Stephanie. They are unsure of his motives and are trying to find a way to neutralize the situation without making him angry or going to the police.
3. Brooke and Nick have recently renewed their wedding vows, but Jackie is disappointed that they are not planning on having children together. Brooke explains to Jackie and Nick that she does not want to have any more children and that Nick understands and supports her decision.

1. Flo, played by Katrina Bowden, is revealed to be the kidney donor for Katie, Brooke's sister. This revelation is met with shock and disbelief by the Logan family, who struggle to reconcile Flo's past actions with her current sacrifice. Despite the family's reservations, Katie expresses her gratitude to Flo for giving her a second chance at life.
2. Meanwhile, Wyatt and Sally are taking care of Beth and Douglas. Wyatt expresses his admiration for Douglas' strength and resilience, while Sally acknowledges the challenges of taking care of a baby. The topic of Flo comes up, and Wyatt insists that he has moved on from his high school love. However, Sally remains skeptical, suspecting that Flo still has feelings for Wyatt. The conversation is interrupted by a call from the hospital, bringing news of Katie's successful transplant.

1. Quinn is worried about her son Wyatt being corrupted by Katie Logan and is upset that her husband Eric is not supporting her concerns. Mateo, a massage therapist, tries to calm her down and help her relax her back, which she injured while physically intervening in Wyatt and Katie's relationship.
2. Charlie and Pam enter the restaurant and are surprised to see Sheila Carter, an old enemy of the Forrester family, working as a waitress. Sheila tries to convince them that she has changed and is trying to start a new life, but Pam is skeptical.
3. Katie tells Eric about Quinn's violent behavior when she found Wyatt and Katie together in Katie's bedroom. Katie is upset that Eric continues to defend Quinn despite her violent actions.
4. Quinn expresses her doubts about Katie to Mateo and admits that she may have overreacted. Mateo reassures her and compliments her passion and determination.
5. Eric confronts Quinn about her behavior and expresses his disappointment. Sheila and Mateo gossip about the situation and Sheila expresses her excitement about the escalating pattern of violence.
6. Mateo tells Sheila that he gave Quinn a massage and that Eric was very angry when he came to confront her. Sheila is pleased and reaffirms her plan to be with Eric.

1. Ridge called in a favor from a judge to give Bill more visitation rights with his son, Will.
2. Bill is grateful to Brooke for helping him with this situation, but she denies having any involvement.
3. Pam and Charlie are getting married, and Eric and Quinn are happy for them.
4. Pam wants to get married in the Forrester living room, under Stephanie's portrait.
5. Thorne is upset about Bill's behavior towards Brooke and Steffy.
6. Ridge has told Brooke to stay away from Bill, and she has agreed.
7. Bill is still pursuing Brooke, and she has asked him to stay away.
8. Ridge is worried about Bill's intentions towards Brooke and is determined to protect his family.
9. Brooke assures Ridge that she only loves him and is not interested in Bill.
10. Brooke asks Ridge to stop talking about ending things with Bill, as it is not like him to speak that way.

1. Jake, the pilot, informs Massimo and Nick that there has been a delay in their departure from Puerto Vista, but they have clearance to leave as soon as Stephanie and Brooke arrive.
2. Nick is worried about Brooke and tries to call her cell phone. They are surprised to find her with Ridge, who was thought to have died in a furnace accident but actually escaped with the help of Anna.
3. Ridge thanks Nick for taking care of Brooke when he was believed to be dead. Eric and Stephanie are on their way to Puerto Vista, but there was trouble at Forrester, and Eric had to fly back right away.
4. Deacon asks Amber to leave his place as he doesn't want to confuse his son. Amber is upset and argues that she is the mother of his child. Bridget intervenes and tries to calm the situation.
5. Sally is upset about Fenmore's department store advertising their pre-Thanksgiving sale and feels that everyone is rushing around, pushing things ahead.
6. Amber is having a heated argument with Oscar about her job and her son. She is upset that Deacon kicked her out of his place and feels that she is not good enough for her son.
7. Oscar tries to cheer Amber up by reminding her that she raised a good kid and that she will always be a part of him. He also tells her that she is talented and that he believes in her.

1. Rick, president of a fashion company, is not happy with a dress design by Caroline and Ridge. He criticizes the design, comparing it to a dead bird.
2. Hope gives Deacon an ultimatum to choose between her and Quinn. She believes Quinn is manipulating Deacon to get close to her and her baby.
3. Wyatt asks his mother and Hope's father to leave his house, as he believes they are causing tension between him and Hope.
4. Rick and Maya discuss the whereabouts of Caroline and Ridge. Maya implies that they might be having an affair, but Rick dismisses her concerns.
5. Ridge and Caroline have a sentimental moment, expressing their appreciation for each other's work.
6. Hope and Wyatt discuss their parents' relationship. Hope is worried that Quinn is using Deacon to get close to her and her baby.
7. Deacon confronts Quinn about her intentions, suspecting that she might be using him to get to Hope and the baby.
8. Maya tells Rick that she saw Caroline and Ridge in an intimate embrace, but Rick dismisses her concerns.

1. Bill Spencer is in the hospital after being pushed off a balcony by Ridge Forrester. Ridge is not interested in discussing the incident, but Bill brings it up and accuses Ridge of being the one who should be in the hospital if he had pressed charges. Ridge denies this and says that Bill is only trying to get close to Brooke.
2. Eric Forrester is concerned about Bill getting out of the hospital and not pressing charges. Brooke assures him that Bill is trying to change his life and practice forgiveness. She believes that Bill's motivation is to repair his relationships with his family and be a better father to his children.
3. Pam is planning to get married at Eric's house, but she and Quinn argue over the details. Pam is upset that Quinn called her wedding "damn" and that she destroyed Stephanie's portrait. Quinn tells Pam that she has done nothing for her and is only allowing the wedding to take place to snow Eric.
4. Eric and Brooke discuss Bill's sudden change of heart. Eric is skeptical and thinks that Bill's motivation has more to do with Brooke than he is willing to admit. Brooke insists that Bill is trying to change and regain the trust of his family.
5. Ridge confronts Bill in the hospital and accuses him of wanting to get closer to Brooke. Bill denies this and tells Ridge that he is more of a man than he will ever be. Ridge tells Bill that he is not going to let Brooke down again and that Bill will not be able to put a wedge between them.
6. Pam becomes emotional while planning her wedding and decides to cancel it due to the conflict with Quinn. She is upset that Quinn destroyed Stephanie's portrait and feels disrespected. Eric tries to calm the situation, but Pam is too emotional to continue with the wedding plans.

1. Thomas enlists Brooke's help for a public relations stunt to promote his new men's line at Forrester Creations.
2. Taylor expresses concern to Whip about Thomas's plan, worrying that it may overshadow Hope's successful fashion line launch.
3. Hope checks on Oliver's job status after hearing about the changes in the fashion show schedule and expresses her support for him.
4. Thomas prepares for his fashion show debut, expressing frustration about Hope's line getting more attention than his.
5. Brooke and Taylor have a tense interaction about Brooke's involvement in Thomas's line, with Taylor expressing concern about Brooke's past scandals.
6. Thomas delivers a successful introduction of his men's line, expressing gratitude for Brooke's contributions.
7. Hope and Oliver share a moment, expressing their appreciation for each other and their hope for a future together.

1. Brooke and Ridge are concerned about Thomas' recent behavior and his whereabouts, as he has been chasing Hope and hasn't been in touch with anyone.
2. Hope reveals to Brooke that she killed Thomas by pushing him into a vat of hydrofluoric acid, but Brooke tries to convince her to keep it a secret as there is no evidence left.
3. Ridge tells Steffy that Thomas asked Hope for joint custody of Douglas in exchange for sex, and later changed tactics by asking her out for dinner and leaving Douglas in a dressing room.
4. Thomas chased Hope around the building after dinner, causing her to run away in fear. Hope is determined to tell Ridge the truth about what happened.
5. Ridge and Steffy discuss Thomas' joint custody agreement with Hope, which they believe will make it difficult for Thomas to move on from his obsession with Hope.
6. Thomas suddenly appears, revealing that he is alive, surprising and shocking Hope.

<summary>

1. Brooke and Ridge are worried about Thomas' behavior and disappearance.
2. Hope confesses to Brooke that she killed Thomas, but Brooke urges her to keep it a secret.
3. Ridge informs Steffy about Thomas' attempts to manipulate Hope for custody and sex.
4. Hope decides to tell Ridge the truth about Thomas' death.
5. Ridge and Steffy express concerns about Thomas' joint custody agreement with Hope.
6. Thomas reappears, revealing that he is alive, surprising Hope.

</summary>

1. Brooke asks Stephanie if she can wait for Eric, and Stephanie grunts in response. Stephanie is trying to take off a ring and is coughing and breathing heavily.
2. Hope, Eric, Pam, and Rick are discussing a tribute video they made for Stephanie. Eric is unsure if he should show it to her because of her current health situation.
3. Tony and Kristen are having a heartfelt conversation. Tony appreciates that Kristen never treated him differently because of his HIV positive status and Kristen tells her mom that she was a good mother.
4. Katie is experiencing postpartum depression and feels like she is dying. Taylor reassures her that she will be okay and encourages her to be there for her son.
5. Thorne and Felicia are having a conversation about their relationship. Thorne felt like Felicia didn't love him as much because she had another son, but now realizes that she was letting him go his own way.
6. Stephanie is taking off her ring and gives it to Brooke. She wants Brooke to have it and tells her that she hurt her but also saved her.
7. Katie is worried that her son won't want her because he wouldn't take her breast and turned away from her. Taylor reassures her that it is not her fault and that the medication may be causing a reaction in the baby.
8. Donna, Rick, Marcus, and Steffy are all expressing their gratitude towards Stephanie. They all acknowledge that she has been a strong and influential figure in their lives.
9. Brooke is reading a story to Stephanie and they are reflecting on their relationship. Brooke expresses her love and apologizes for the pain she caused Stephanie.
10. Katie is holding her son for the first time and expresses her love for him. Donna is there to support her and encourages her to be confident in her ability to be a good mother.

1. Stephanie has been shot and is in the hospital after an argument with Donna. Donna is a suspect in the shooting, as Stephanie accused her of being the shooter before losing consciousness.
2. Eric is seeking the truth about what happened and asks Donna to tell him what she knows. Donna denies shooting Stephanie and insists she was in the showroom when the shooting occurred.
3. Ridge and Brooke discuss the situation, with Ridge believing that someone from Brooke's family is responsible for the shooting. Brooke denies this and is upset that Ridge seems to be taking Stephanie's side over hers.
4. Donna becomes increasingly agitated as Stephanie continues to accuse her of the shooting. Donna denies any involvement and suggests that Stephanie may have shot herself to win Eric's sympathy.
5. Eric tries to get to the bottom of what happened, but Stephanie is heavily medicated and unable to provide a clear account of the events leading up to the shooting.
6. Pam shows up at the hospital to support Eric and Stephanie, and offers to stay at the house to take care of things while Eric is at the hospital.
7. Donna continues to deny any involvement in the shooting, and warns Stephanie that she will be the next Mrs. Eric Forrester. Stephanie remains adamant that Donna is the shooter, but Donna suggests that the real culprit is still out there.

1. Phoebe has returned home from her singing tour, and Taylor is thrilled to have her back. Phoebe is unsure if she will stay, as her relationship with Constantine is unclear.
2. Ridge and Brooke are preparing for their wedding, but Rick is not supportive. Ridge does not want Rick to attend the wedding or rehearsal dinner due to his stubbornness.
3. Phoebe visits Ridge and they have a heart-to-heart conversation. Ridge is glad she is back home and Phoebe gives him a barrette she has been wearing as a reminder of his protection.
4. Phoebe has written a song for Ridge and offers to sing it at the rehearsal dinner. Ridge is honored and looks forward to spending time with her after the wedding.
5. Taylor and Ridge discuss Phoebe's return and the upcoming wedding. Taylor is still in love with Ridge but understands they will not be getting back together.
6. Ridge agrees to spend time with Taylor and the family, watching movies and playing tennis, for the sake of the children. Taylor agrees to move on and not attend the wedding.
7. Brooke tries to convince Rick to support her relationship with Ridge, but he refuses. Brooke is disappointed but realizes Rick's opinion is the only one against their union.
8. Brooke explains to Rick that she and Ridge are committed to each other and their family. She wishes Rick could be a part of their plans but understands he is not willing to do so.
9. Despite Rick's refusal to support their relationship, Brooke asks him to be there for her wedding and celebrate her special day. Rick ultimately agrees and tells Brooke he loves her.

1. Brooke and Ridge have a disagreement about how to handle the news that Brooke is the biological mother of Taylor and Nick's son, Jack. Ridge is concerned about the potential impact on his relationship with Brooke, while Brooke believes that the four of them can spend time together and that there is nothing between her and Nick. Ridge ultimately asks Brooke to respect his feelings and not spend time with Jack.
2. Nick suggests that Brooke be allowed to see Jack once in a while, but Taylor is against the idea. She is worried about the potential harm and temptation of having Brooke involved in their lives. Nick believes that Brooke should be able to see Jack, but Taylor puts the baby to bed and ends the conversation.
3. Brooke and Nick meet at the Marlin and discuss their situations with Ridge and Taylor. Both of their partners are having a hard time handling the news, and Brooke decides that she needs to let go of Jack for the sake of her future with Ridge and the kids. She will not see Jack anymore, and it breaks her heart to do so.

1. Brooke and Thorne have a conversation about their past relationship and Thorne expresses his desire to be with Brooke again.
2. Brooke mentions that she has a son with Ridge and that it's not simple to just be with Thorne.
3. Thorne tells Brooke that Ridge hurts her and that he doesn't want to see that.
4. Ivy and Quinn are discussing engagement rings and Simon, a new intern, gives his opinion on the rings.
5. Simon then surprises Ivy by proposing to her, but she declines.
6. Nicole and Maya are discussing their lives and Maya's recent trip to South Africa.
7. Nicole mentions that Thorne is back and staying at Brooke's house.
8. Ridge and Quinn are discussing engagement ring options for Ridge and Brooke.
9. Brooke and Thorne have a conversation about Ridge and Quinn's relationship and Thorne's feelings for Brooke.
10. Thorne tells Brooke that she deserves better than Ridge and that he would treat her better.

1. Nicole asks Brady for help in dealing with Mia, who is threatening to reveal Nicole's plan to adopt a baby. Brady suggests that Nicole tell Mia the truth, but Nicole refuses and gets angry with Brady.
2. Charlotte and John discuss John's therapy sessions with Dr. Taylor. Charlotte encourages John to continue with hypnosis, and John agrees.
3. Chelsea and Max run into each other at a bakery. Chelsea is picking up a cake for Lucas and Chloe's engagement party, and Max is returning a phone he found at the Horton cabin on New Year's Eve. Max mentions that he left Chelsea several messages, and Chelsea explains that she didn't return his calls because she couldn't get in touch with him.
4. Kate invites Daniel to Lucas and Chloe's engagement party, but Daniel is hesitant to attend because of his complicated history with Chloe. Kate assures Daniel that she and Chloe are no longer seeing each other and that Daniel is welcome at the party.
5. Nicole tells Mia that she cannot meet her fiancé because he is out of the country on business. Mia insists on meeting the father of the baby before she agrees to give up the baby for adoption.
6. Daniel tries to talk Chloe out of marrying Lucas, but Chloe insists that she loves Lucas and wants to go through with the wedding. Daniel is concerned that Chloe is making a mistake and that she doesn't truly love Lucas.
1. Adrienne visits Jennifer and brings JJ some of Alex's guitar picks for his friend

1. Melanie is upset because her father is leaving town to take some time for himself due to his hand tremor that prevents him from working. Chad tries to comfort her and they end up in an awkward situation where Chad confesses his feelings for Melanie. Melanie, however, is still hung up on Abigail and walks away.
2. Kate has seen the photos from the photo shoot and wants Chad and Gabi to be the new faces of Countess Wilhelmina. She offers them a modeling contract, but Gabi is hesitant because she is worried about her brother's reaction. Meanwhile, Sami and Madison are pleased with the progress of their plan to take down Kate and Madison offers Sami a bonus for her hard work.

1. Rex and Mimi have a conversation about Mimi's friendship with Belle and how it has caused tension in their relationship. Mimi reveals to Rex that she had an abortion and didn't tell him about it.
2. Belle is trying to contact Philip before he goes to war to tell him that she doesn't love him and is in love with Shawn. Jan tries to guilt Belle into staying with Philip by saying that if she ends the marriage now, it will devastate him and may even cause his death.
3. Kate is at John's side as he recovers from a drug overdose. She hired a private investigator to follow Sami and found out that Sami loves Lucas and just wants him to be happy.
4. Mimi is worried that she is coming down with the flu and takes some aspirin. Rex wants to put the tension between him and Mimi behind them and talk about what happened.
5. Belle is hesitant to send an email to Philip revealing that she doesn't love him, but Shawn tells her that it's the only way and that Philip deserves to know the truth.
6. Jan threatens to tell Rex about Mimi's abortion if Belle ends her marriage to Philip. Mimi is worried about how to tell Rex about the abortion and is also worried about a doll that Jan gave her.

1. EJ and Sami are discussing business matters over the phone. Sami is trying to handle a problem with a distributor for Countess W, and EJ is offering to send Cedric to help. Sami refuses, stating that it is her division and she needs to handle it herself. She also mentions that if Kristen had not left them in this situation, they would not be in this predicament. EJ does not want to discuss his sister with Sami, as it will only lead to more problems.
2. JJ is talking to his Aunt Kayla about Theresa. Kayla has heard that JJ has been seen with Theresa, and she is concerned. JJ assures her that he has nothing to do with Theresa, but Kayla feels like he is not telling her the whole story. JJ eventually admits that there is something going on and asks for Kayla's help.
3. Daniel and Nicole are trying to find Chyka, the man who tried to kill Nicole. They believe he is hiding in a remote location, and they are trying to gather evidence to turn over to the police. Daniel is hesitant, as he knows that what they are doing is illegal and could get them killed. Nicole is determined to clear Eric's name and is willing to take the risk.

1. Carly wakes up buried alive, thanks to Vivian's henchman Gus. Vivian reveals that she has kidnapped Melanie, who is getting ready for her wedding.
2. Hope is worried about Vivian's intentions towards Melanie, but Victor assures her that he has everything under control. Maggie decides not to attend Melanie's wedding as it's her anniversary with Mickey, and she doesn't want to bring everyone down.
3. Chloe surprises Daniel by baking for him and reveals that she's pregnant with his baby. Nathan and Stephanie plan to go on a vacation together.
4. Vivian reveals to Carly that she has no intention of killing Melanie but instead has poisoned her wedding veil, which will cause her death soon.
5. Melanie has second thoughts about marrying Philip and sends a letter to Nathan, asking him if he still has feelings for her. Nathan doesn't read the letter and instead focuses on his trip with Stephanie.
6. Victor and Philip are in a bind as the justice of the peace has the flu. Stefano steps in to save the day by offering to marry them.
7. Carly manages to escape from the basement and warns Bo about Vivian's plan. Vivian is arrested before she can harm Melanie. The wedding goes on as planned, and Melanie marries Philip.

1. Max is overwhelmed with Mimi's problems and feels responsible for fixing them. He also reveals to Abby that he is scared to start racing again after a crash that almost killed him and someone else. Abby encourages him to get back into racing.
2. Chelsea is devastated after her father tells her to leave and never come back. Billie and Nick go to look for her and find her at the park. Chelsea says she is not meant to be loved and that she and Billie are cursed. Billie reassures her that she is loved and proud of her.

1. Abe and Lexie are dealing with the aftermath of their affair. Abe's night vision is still not back to normal, and he is frustrated. Lexie tries to reassure him, but Tek confronts her about their relationship and tells her that Abe doesn't want her.
2. Marlena is worried about Alex's safety and confronts John about his threats. John admits that he hates Alex and wants to kill him, but Marlena tells him that she has chosen Alex over him.
3. Mimi is feeling guilty about keeping the secret that Shawn is the father of Belle's baby. She decides to tell him the truth, but Bonnie tries to talk her out of it.
4. Philip overhears Belle talking to Shawn and realizes that she wants to tell him the truth about the baby. Philip suggests a group hug, and Kate tells Victor that they need to let Belle and Philip be happy with their baby.

1. Marlena is carrying a bug-sweeping device in her purse, which she received from Roman. John is upset about this and wants to know who gave it to her. Marlena tells him to stop making a big deal out of it.
2. Rolf, a professor, calls Rex and wants to meet with him. Rex is doing independent study work and agrees to meet with him. Rolf mentions that he doesn't want to bother Count Dimera, so Rex tells him that his father is not home.
3. Shawn and Belle are having a peaceful moment, holding hands and enjoying each other's company. Belle suggests that they never fight again, and Shawn agrees. They talk about how well they fit together and how lucky they are to have each other.
4. Kate is upset with Roman for dragging her away from her dinner with Tony. Roman is jealous of Tony and accuses Kate of using him to get back at him. Kate denies this and tells Roman that she was having a great time with Tony.
5. Rex and Rolf are discussing Rex's studies when Rolf mentions that he performed tasks for Stefano Dimera over the years. Rex realizes that Rolf has a connection to him and his sister and wants to know more. Rolf reveals that he was the doctor who delivered Rex and Cassie and that they were created as part of an experiment for human perfection.
6. Kate tells Roman about her past as a prostitute and is worried that he will not want her anymore. Roman assures her that he loves her for who she is and not for her past. They continue to make love, and Kate expresses her happiness and satisfaction.

1. Chelsea, a patient of Dr. Jonas, has passed out and is being treated in the hospital. Her grandmother, Kate, suspects that there is more to her condition than what Dr. Jonas is letting on. Chelsea's boyfriend, Nick, is also present and worried about her.
2. Ava, a character with a history of mental instability, has taken several people hostage, including Kayla and Steve. She is demanding that they reenact her wedding day with Steve, who she believes was the love of her life.
3. Sami and E.J. are having marital problems. Sami is upset that E.J. is representing Nicole, Sami's enemy, in her divorce. E.J. refuses to drop Nicole as a client, and Sami threatens to tell an immigration officer about E.J.'s past criminal activities.
4. Daniel is trying to distract Chelsea from her fears about her medical condition by talking to her about her dream vacation to Australia.
5. Hope has been injured and is in need of medical attention. Bo, Kayla, and Steve are trying to get her to a hospital, but are being hindered by Ava's henchman, George.

1. Rafe is found and reunited with his family. It is revealed that Bo's brother, Roman, had asked Rafe to take a leave of absence from the police force due to his struggles after the accident. Rafe had ignored this request and started searching for Theo and Ciara on his own, eventually finding them before Bo did. Rafe is hailed as a hero and Bo thanks him for his efforts.
2. Nicole has been suspecting that EJ and Stefano were involved in Rafe's accident and subsequent memory loss. She shares her suspicions with Chloe, who warns her to be careful. Nicole decides to drop the matter and reconcile with EJ, planning to surprise him at home.
3. EJ and Taylor continue to struggle with their feelings for each other, with EJ deciding to divorce Nicole in order to be with Taylor. Taylor is against this decision, believing it will break Nicole's heart. EJ argues that it is the best thing for Nicole, as she can then be with Brady.
4. Chad decides to work for Stefano at DiMera Enterprises instead of interning at the hospital. Kate had orchestrated the situation, manipulating Chad into changing his mind. Stefano is pleased with this development, believing that Chad can make a big difference in the world.

1. Jack, who was believed to be dead, returns home and surprises his family. He and Abby celebrate her 17th birthday with cake. Jack feels guilty about eating the cake without their baby son, Jack Jr., but Jennifer reassures him that they will wait until the baby is older to tell him about it.
2. Belle and Mimi discuss their concerns about their respective romantic relationships. Belle is upset that her father, Victor, is involved with Kate, who she believes only cares about her own sons and not Shawn. Mimi is worried about how Kate will react when she finds out that Mimi accidentally caused Jan Spears' injury.
3. Bo and Billie investigate a lead on the whereabouts of their missing daughter, Georgia. They enter an abandoned house and find a sweater with Georgia's name on it, along with her blood. They suspect that someone is holding her captive and is trying to lure them to the house.
4. Marlena and Roman, who were believed to be dead, return home and surprise their loved ones. Marlena is reunited with John, and Roman is reunited with Kate.
5. Hope is worried when she cannot reach Bo and suspects that he is with Billie. Jennifer tells her that Bo and Billie went to investigate a lead on Georgia's whereabouts.
6. Bo and Billie find Georgia in the abandoned house. She is injured and in need of medical attention.

1. Paul is investigating a lead on Deimos' whereabouts and has found out that he chartered a plane to Canada.
2. Sonny and Paul plan to go to Canada to find Deimos and keep him from causing harm to Brady and Nicole.
3. Brady and Nicole are enjoying time together with their children when they are interrupted by a man who has broken into their home and is working for Deimos.
4. Tripp is struggling with the information he has learned about his father and finds it difficult to forgive him for killing his mother.
5. Jade tries to help Tripp understand that Steve is a good person who was trying to protect someone he loves.
6. Abigail and Gabi have a heated conversation about Chad and his love for both of them.
7. Eli and Gabi go on a date, and Eli compares Abigail to Emma from Jane Austen's Emma.
8. Sonny and Paul arrive in Canada and plan to talk to Brady and Nicole to find out where Deimos is.
9. The man working for Deimos shoots Brady, and Nicole is left screaming and crying for help.

1. John receives a call from Roman, who is looking for Kate and asks for John's help. John is reluctant to get involved in Kate's love life, but Marlena suggests that John shares some of the blame for the situation since he sent Kate to Rome.
2. Belle calls Marlena, sounding shaken and tells her that something bad happened at a party that Cassie threw at the mansion. Marlena and John head over to the mansion to check on Belle and the others.
3. It is revealed that Vin Ramsell, a drug dealer, tried to poison Shawn's drink, but Belle almost drank it instead. Bo arrives at the scene and begins to investigate.
4. Bo and Hope question those present at the party, including Cassie and her boyfriend Chaz, who is a friend of Ramsell's. It is revealed that Ramsell has a history of drug-related crimes and that he is currently out on bail.
5. Bo and Hope suspect that Ramsell is trying to send a message to Shawn, who was instrumental in putting him behind bars. They vow to find him and bring him to justice.

1. Brady and Kristen are getting married, and this is causing tension among their families and friends. John, Marlena's ex-husband, is particularly upset and is planning to seduce Kristen before the wedding to show Brady who she really is. Eric, Marlena's son, has also gotten involved in the situation and has advised Kristen to take responsibility for her past actions.
2. Meanwhile, at the hospital, Daniel and Jennifer are trying to have a quiet morning together, but are interrupted by Anne, who is concerned about Jennifer's professionalism and personal conduct. Anne and Jennifer get into an argument, and Anne threatens to report Jennifer to Mr. Burns. Daniel intervenes and warns Anne that he will reveal her own wrongdoings if she continues to harass Jennifer.

1. Kate and Lucas discuss Lucas's recent trip to Houston and his ex-girlfriend, Sheryl. Kate admits to using Sheryl and Lucas is upset.
2. Jordan tells Rafe that she loves him, and they reconcile. Ben asks Abigail about a past wrongdoing, but she doesn't want to talk about it.
3. Sonny admits to Will that he was going to shoot Nick, but Will talks him out of it. Sami and EJ discuss their plan to have Nick killed.
4. Julie confronts Nick about his behavior and tells him that she is worried about him. Nick expresses his desire for a happy life with Gabi.
5. Sami and EJ go for a walk to get fresh air after having Nick killed. Jordan decides to stay in Salem for Rafe.
6. Lucas asks Jordan to watch Allie for a half-hour. Julie takes Nick out to dinner, but he decides to stay home instead.
7. Will finds out about the court date for Gabi and Nick's custody battle. Abigail confides in Will about a mistake she made in the past.
8. Nick is shot in Horton Square and Julie screams for help.

1. Sami is reluctant to attend her mother's funeral, but Lucas convinces her to go. Sami expresses her grief and anger over the loss of her loved ones.
2. Belle and Philip attend Marlena's funeral. Belle regrets not being there for her mother and wonders why Shawn hasn't shown up.
3. Jan keeps Shawn captive and tries to convince him to stay with her. Shawn insists that he wants to be with Belle.
4. Nicole plans to attend Marlena's funeral despite not being invited. She gets a call from Crystal, who is in jail and needs bail money.
5. Celeste senses Marlena's presence and tries to stop the funeral. John dismisses her claims and insists on burying Marlena.
6. Jan refuses to give Nicole the money to bail Crystal out of jail. Nicole threatens to reveal Jan's role in Craig's death.
7. Various characters give eulogies for Marlena, expressing their love and grief. Sami struggles to say goodbye to her mother.
8. Hope reveals that she hasn't heard from Shawn, and Belle expresses her concern for his safety.
9. Sami hears Marlena's voice calling her name from inside the casket.

1. Nick Fallon discovers that his friend and bartender, Max, made significant changes to his final proposal for a grant without his knowledge or approval. Nick is upset and decides to return the grant money, stating that Max earned it. Max tries to downplay the situation, but Nick is determined to confront him in private.
2. Stephanie is worried about her brother, Max, who has been acting strangely and hiding an amazing gift from everyone. She confides in her mother, Kayla, about Max's behavior and his refusal to acknowledge his gift. Max has been getting into fights and is angry all the time, which is not like his usual self.
3. A fire breaks out at a warehouse where John's impounded cargo was stored. John suspects that Philip Kiriakis is behind it, and he is determined to take care of the problem himself. Ava, John's friend, encourages him to deal with the situation and offers her help if needed.
4. Lucas is under house arrest and is getting frustrated with the situation. He paces around the room, and Sami notices his behavior. She tells him that he can trust her and that he can tell her anything. Lucas denies having any secrets to share, and Sami drops the subject. Later, Lucas meets a stranger named Paul, who seems familiar to him.

1. Chloe considers telling Daniel about her infidelity to prevent him from leaving her after their wedding. Melanie confronts Chloe about her erratic behavior regarding the wedding.
2. Daniel discusses the details of his low-key wedding with Kevin. Jennifer talks to her mother, Laura, about finishing a scrapbook for her grandmother, Alice.
3. Kate finds a safe deposit box that Stefano had broken into and demands that he return its contents. Madeline also confronts Stefano about the box.
4. Caroline, Kayla, and Stephanie visit Alice, who is in hospice care. Jennifer talks to her brother, Mike, who is delayed in Boston.
5. Philip and Lucas discuss Chloe's infidelity and the status of her wedding to Daniel. Melanie expresses her concerns about Chloe to Philip.
6. Chloe and Melanie discuss their past relationships and Melanie gives Chloe her mother's necklace as a wedding gift.
7. The text ends abruptly with various characters in different locations, including the hospital, the pub, and the DiMera mansion.

1. Hope and Aiden decide to go to the Green Mountain Lodge for a few days to get away from the craziness and distractions in Salem. Hope wants to spend time alone with Aiden to figure things out. Rafe is suspicious of their plans but Hope assures him that it is not a honeymoon.
2. Abigail is worried about being sent to a state asylum with more security. Marlena reassures her that the police have not finished their investigation yet and they don't know what conclusions they will come to. Abigail continues to have hallucinations of Ben.
3. Chase is transferred to a private psychiatric hospital for intense therapy. Ciara gets a volunteer position at Shady Hills and hopes to be with Abigail when Chad isn't. Monahan confesses to Roman that he was the one who killed Stefano DiMera.

1. Abe and Theo will attend Samantha's wedding. EJ asks Abe to perform the ceremony as a surprise for Samantha.
2. Jennifer and Paige discuss Paige's mother, who is a singer and creative person. Paige's mother is moving to Salem and Paige is excited to spend the summer with her.
3. JJ meets Paige's mother, Eve, and is nervous about her finding out about his criminal past.
4. Jordan is worried about Ben's safety and thinks it's only a matter of time before he is found.
5. Kate talks to Rafe about Gabi and how her actions have affected Rafe and Jordan's relationship.
6. Abigail is helping Sami plan her wedding and Sami appreciates her friendship and understanding of EJ.
7. Paige brings her mother to meet Jennifer and JJ for dinner. Paige's mother is surprised to find out that JJ is from the Deveraux family.
8. EJ invites Rafe and Jordan to his and Sami's wedding. Rafe declines the invitation.

1. Kate visits Victor to offer her condolences for Caroline's death, but suspects he's also mourning the loss of his one true love.
2. Xander plans to kill Ted, who has been kidnapped by Nicole and is being held captive.
3. Sami confronts Nicole about blaming Eric for Holly's death, but Nicole refuses to listen.
4. Rex and Sarah announce their plan to get married immediately, leaving Eric and Nicole to deal with their own relationship issues.
5. Hope is searching for Ted, who has gone missing, and suspects Nicole may be involved.
6. Kate and Victor discuss the possibility of Xander and Nicole working together to use Titan and Dimera for their own purposes.
7. Xander decides not to kill Ted after hearing about his relationship with Sarah and realizing he wants to change his ways for her.
8. Brady tries to convince Nicole not to work for Dimera, but she is determined to help Stefan.
9. Nicole reveals to Brady that she wants to start over with him, but he turns her down, still feeling loyalty towards Eric.

1. Hope is worried about Ben Weston being around Ciara and wants Marlena to help her convince Ciara that Ben is a danger to her. Marlena has been treating Ben and believes he is mentally fit and not a threat.
2. Lani receives copies of her son David's birth certificate in the mail and is emotional about the fact that he will never have a chance to live his life. Eli comforts her and they share a moment.
3. Chad and Gabi have a conversation about the past and Chad expresses his gratitude for Gabi's ability to let go of their history. Gabi assures Chad that she will always be there for him.
4. Abigail and Stefan discuss the upcoming baby and Abigail makes it clear that Stefan will not be involved in the pregnancy or the baby's life. Stefan tries to guilt Abigail by bringing up her alters, particularly Gabby.
5. Chad talks to Marlena about his feelings regarding Abigail's pregnancy and the fact that the baby is also part of Gabby. Marlena encourages Chad to open his heart to the baby and try to move past his feelings of betrayal.
6. Lani confronts Eli about comforting another woman and accuses him of harassment. Eli apologizes for his actions and Lani regrets sleeping with him.
7. Gabi and JJ have a heart-to-heart conversation about the past year and JJ encourages Gabi to focus on the positive things in her life, including her daughter.

1. At John and Marlena's wedding, Sami interrupts the ceremony, claiming that if Marlena marries John, she will die. Sami is agitated and appears to be under the influence of drugs. She insists that someone named "she" is there to kill Marlena.
2. Sami's outburst leads to confusion and chaos, with some guests believing she is drunk or mentally unstable. John and Eric try to calm Sami down and take her to the E.R., but she refuses and insists that they need to leave the wedding to avoid danger.
3. Meanwhile, Will experiences a sudden memory of his wedding day with Sonny, which triggers a series of memories from his past. He becomes emotional and overwhelmed, leading him to leave the wedding to process his feelings.
4. Back at the wedding, the commotion continues as Susan, who has been invited to the wedding, tries to defend herself against Sami's accusations. Susan reveals that she was the one who brought Will back from the brink of death, and she is there to make amends.
5. Amidst the chaos, Kristen Dimera, who was believed to be dead, appears at the wedding. She holds the crowd hostage, demanding that Marlena pay for pushing her out of a tower window and leaving her for dead. Kristen threatens to kill Marlena and John on their wedding day.
6. Brady tries to reason with Kristen, reminding her of their past and her desire to be a mother. He suggests that she put down the gun and end the hostage situation peacefully. However, Kristen refuses and insists that she will not let Marlena and John live happily ever after.
7. Will returns to the wedding, where he is reunited with Sonny. He shares his memories of their past and their daughter, expressing his love and gratitude for their relationship. The wedding continues, with Marlena and John eventually exchanging vows and becoming husband and wife.

1. JJ has told his mother Jennifer that he is working undercover for the DEA to get Kyle off the streets and away from Paige. Kyle is skeptical and wants proof, but Eve assures him that JJ would never lie to his mother.
2. Will is missing Sonny and Arianna, but knows he needs to give Sonny time to process his feelings. Paul and John discuss Sonny's situation and Paul mentions that he was a threat to Will's marriage.
3. Adrienne and Lucas are on a date and Lucas surprises her with a night time bungee jump off of Lookout Bridge. Adrienne is hesitant at first due to her acrophobia, but ultimately decides to take the leap with Lucas.
4. Caroline is in the hospital and Hope, Maggie, and Julie want her to join them on the steering committee for Salem's bicentennial celebration. Caroline is hesitant, but eventually agrees to participate.
5. Abigail confesses to Chad that the baby is his and not Ben's. She explains that she finally understood that Chad was pushing her away to protect her from his father.
6. Serena and Chad are at a bar and Serena is drunk. She warns Chad that being with her would hurt his reputation, but Chad doesn't care. They start to kiss, but Serena pulls away and tells Chad that no means no.

1. Will is waiting for news about his grandmother, who is in surgery after being shot. Sonny offers to take over reading duties to Will's daughter so that Will can stay and wait for news.
2. Vivian, Kate's daughter, is calling the hospital to get information on her mother's condition. She is frustrated to be told that she is not on the list of people authorized to receive information.
3. Jennifer and Jack are discussing the destruction of the vials of serum that were meant to help Jack regain his memory. Jack believes that Eve is responsible, as she had both motive and opportunity.
4. Kristen is trying to convince Brady to be with her, but Brady is conflicted and feels guilty about his attraction to her.
5. Nicole is signing divorce papers with Xander, who reveals that he is now with Sarah. Nicole is skeptical and warns Xander that she will not let him come between her and Eric.
6. Eve is at the Dimera office during an emergency board meeting to discuss Kate's shooting. She offers to help Stefan deal with the crisis, citing her past experience at Dimera.
7. Jack is looking for Dr. Rolf, who has gone missing after the destruction of the lab. Jennifer suggests that he may have gone back to the pub for seconds on the pot roast.
8. Kristen is trying to convince Brady to give in to their attraction, but Brady is resistant and feels guilty about his feelings.
9. Nicole is checking on Holly and Eric, and Xander warns her that she might walk in on something. Nicole assures him that she wants Sarah to know that there are no hard feelings between them.

1. JJ has been shot and is in critical condition at the hospital. Marlena, a psychiatrist, is trying to help him by relieving the pressure on his collapsed lung, as they wait for an ambulance to arrive. Gabi and Chad are with him, trying to keep him calm and conscious.
