2. Orpheus, the shooter, has taken John hostage and is holding him at the pub. Steve has gone to the pub alone to try and rescue John, despite attempts by Kayla to stop him. The hospital is on lockdown, and Steve has called in a SWAT team to help him. Orpheus is aware of this and is threatening to kill John if Steve and the SWAT team try to storm the pub.

1. Gabi, Eli, and Rafe have a conversation about doughnuts and Rafe's injuries. Gabi and Eli leave for work, and Rafe receives a phone call from his attorney about a case.
2. Jennifer apologizes to Kate for writing a negative article about her in the newspaper. Kate declines to give a statement about the recent deals that have gone wrong at Dimera Enterprises.
3. Victor asks Eve to leave the Kiriakis mansion now that it has been confirmed that Will is dead. Eve reveals that she is the new CEO of Basic Black, a company that is partially owned by Titan.
4. Brady tells Victor that he needs to get rid of Eve Donovan to prove that he is capable of being the CEO of Titan again. Victor demotes Brady and tells him to focus on getting sober.
5. Gabi tells Kate that she does not want to sell Gabi Chic to Dimera Enterprises because she does not want to work with Chad. Kate understands and tells Gabi to think about it before making a decision.

1. Sheila, a worker for Abe, the mayor of Salem, is given a second chance to keep her job after calling in sick without notice. Abe's fiancee, Marlena, is being discharged from the hospital and Abe plans to visit Will and Paul, who have recently broken up.
2. Will is trying to find Sonny, who left town after learning about Will's breakup with Paul. Ben confronts Claire about framing him and she admits to knowing about Tripp's plan but claims she only wanted to help Tripp and score points with him. Ben threatens to turn Tripp in to the police.
3. Tripp confesses to Ciara that he framed Ben and she is furious that he lied to her. Tripp says he did it to protect her and thought she still had feelings for Ben. Ciara breaks up with Tripp and he leaves for work.
4. Valerie, Abe's girlfriend, has been offered a job as chief of staff at her old hospital in D.C. and wants to try a long-distance relationship with Abe. Abe is hesitant and expresses his desire for Valerie to stay in Salem with him.
5. Paul is leaving Salem to participate in an experimental program in California that could help him walk again. John, his father, is supportive but sad about his departure. Brady helps Paul move out and Luke, Paul's physical therapist, arrives to assist him.

1. Claire and Ciara are discussing their activities. Claire was taking specimens to the lab, and Ciara was reading to a sweet old lady. Ciara mentions that the old lady wanted her to read "Fifty Shades of Grey," which Claire finds disturbing. Ciara also mentions that she is volunteering as a candy striper to keep her mind off her mother, who is in prison. Ciara mentions that she hasn't seen her mother yet, as the prison only allows inmates four hours of visiting time per month. Claire offers to accompany Ciara when she goes to visit her mother.
2. Abe and Valerie are also present. Abe brings Valerie flowers, and they make small talk. Valerie mentions that she would like some home cooking, so Abe suggests they go to the Brady pub. Valerie mentions that she hasn't been to the pub before, as it didn't exist when she was in Salem previously. Abe and Valerie used to work together when she was a detective in Salem.
3. Theo interrupts Abe and Valerie's conversation and accuses Valerie of lying to Abe. Theo had overheard Valerie telling someone on the phone that she was in Central Park in New York, when in fact, she was in Salem. Valerie admits to lying to her boss in Washington D.C. so that she could stay in Salem to make sure Abe was safe. Abe apologizes for getting Valerie into an awkward situation.
4. Paul and Sonny are also present. Paul informs Sonny that the Hernandez family business is receiving a shipment on a cargo ship that night. Steve and Paul plan to investigate the shipment to find out what it is and if it's legal. Sonny mentions that his father, Lucas, and his mother are all in a room together trying to figure out what they want. Sonny had suggested that they all figure it out together.

1. Rafe tells Sami that he may be reinstated in the FBI and could have access to files that could help find Sydney. Sami is happy for him and thinks he will get the position. They celebrate with champagne. Sami later gets a call from EJ about an urgent matter and leaves.
2. Melanie and Stephanie talk about their relationships. Melanie tells Stephanie that she and Philip are eloping to Las Vegas to get married. Stephanie gives her blessing and they wish each other happiness.
3. Daniel and Chloe are at Chez Rouge for New Year's Eve. Victor confronts Daniel about Carly and tells him that he is a threat to his relationship with Chloe. Daniel tells Victor to leave Carly alone.
4. Vivian has trapped Carly in a box and buried her alive. Carly runs out of water and oxygen and begs Vivian to let her out. Vivian tells Carly that she knows how it feels to lose everything she loves and leaves her to die.

1. Luke Spencer is visited by his old friend Ernesto in the hospital. Ernesto brings him a gift and they reminisce about their past adventures together. Tracy, Luke's wife, is suspicious of Ernesto and asks Luke about him. Luke downplays their relationship and Tracy warns him not to get into any trouble while he is recovering.
2. Lucky Spencer and Elizabeth Webber run into each other at the hospital. They discuss their New Year's Eve and Lucky reveals that he spent it with Sam McCall. Elizabeth is disappointed, but tries to hide her feelings.
3. Diane Miller is excited to have been nominated for "Litigator of the Year" and shares the news with Jason Morgan and Spinelli. They congratulate her, but Jason is preoccupied with finding out where Sonny Corinthos is being held after being arrested in New York.
4. Alexis Davis is nominated for the same award and runs into Carly Corinthos at the Metro Court. Carly serves her with a notice to vacate the hotel for failing to pay rent. Alexis promises to pay and offers Carly some unsolicited advice about making Jax happy.
5. Nikolas Cassadine is visited by Emily Quartermaine's ghost. They discuss his grief and Emily encourages him to live in the present. Lulu Spencer stops by to check on Nikolas and invites him to take a walk with her and Spencer.

1. Sonny discovers that Detective Dominic Pirelli, who he was about to shoot, is actually his son Dante Falconeri. Dante is taken to the hospital in critical condition after being shot in the chest. Sonny calls in his own surgeons, Robin and Patrick, to help save his son's life.
2. At Josslyn's christening party, Carly thanks everyone for attending and expresses her happiness at having a family and friends like them in her life. Molly tries to convince Jason and Sam to get married, but they both insist that they are not getting married anytime soon. Kristina and Michael discuss Dominic and Sonny's whereabouts, and Michael reveals that he told Jax about his suspicions regarding Dominic's true identity.

1. Jason is discussing a possible deal with Claudia Zacchara regarding Sonny's missing son and the shooting of Kate Howard. Claudia is offering a truce between their families in exchange for information about Trevor Lansing. Jason is skeptical and tells Claudia that Sonny doesn't want drugs in the town and has no use for Trevor's organization. Claudia insists that she has ways to bring down Trevor without bringing down her whole organization.
2. Maxie and Spinelli are trying to decipher a clue left behind by Coop, Maxie's deceased boyfriend. The clue is written on the inside of a paper and says "T.M.K." followed by a dash and some letters and numbers - "d-r-n-1-7." Maxie thinks it might be a clue to the identity of the text message killer.
3. Nikolas has realized that Emily holds the key to remembering who killed her. He asks Nadine to wait outside in the hall while he talks to Emily's spirit. Nikolas tells Emily that he needs to remember the truth that she has been carrying all along and that his guilt has always blocked it out. He wants to start playing smart and not afraid.

1. Lucky catches Johnny wearing a Clinton mask and trying to break into Bernie Abrams' office. Johnny denies it and accuses Lucky of kicking him.
2. Carly finds a picture of Franco in Josslyn's christening album and wonders if he's coming after Josslyn. Jason thinks Franco is trying to intimidate him.
3. Sonny meets with Diane and Claire, the federal prosecutor who plans to send him to prison. Claire reveals that Dante is helping her.
4. Jason tells Spinelli to find out where a picture of Franco was made and anything that can lead him to Franco. Jason plans to handle Franco himself.
5. Maxie and Spinelli discuss Johnny and Lucky's relationship and how it's like wearing the wrong clothes to a show. Spinelli gets a call from Jason for help.
6. Lucky questions Johnny about breaking into Bernie's office and why he would do it. Johnny denies it and accuses Lucky of kicking him again.
7. Diane and Alexis discuss the renovations in Diane's office and how it's affecting their work. Alexis is worried about Kristina being near the trial.
8. Sonny and Dante argue about Sonny's love for his children and how it won't help him in court. Dante plans to dismantle Sonny's organization once he's in prison.
9. Jason tells Spinelli not to seek revenge on Franco for sleeping with Maxie. Spinelli wants to prove himself to Maxie and create a video game about private investigation.
10. Nikolas visits Alexis to discuss Elizabeth's reaction to setting up a trust for her baby. Alexis wonders why Nikolas wants another child when he barely sees Spencer.

1. Todd Manning, a dangerous fugitive, is being held at the hospital by John McBain, a detective from Llanview. Todd's daughter, Starr, is grieving the loss of her boyfriend and daughter who were killed in a car accident caused by Sonny Corinthos, a mobster and enemy of Todd. Starr confronts Sonny at the hospital and blames him for the deaths of her loved ones.
2. Maxie Jones, a friend of Robin Scorpio-Drake who died in a lab explosion, is grieving and feeling guilty because she was with Robin in the lab before the explosion. She refuses to see a therapist but opens up to Ewen Keenan, a psychiatrist, about her feelings. Matt Hunter, another friend of Robin, tells Elizabeth Webber that Maxie recanted her story about Elizabeth stealing drugs, and Monica invited Elizabeth back to work at the hospital.
3. Johnny Zacchara wants Steve Webber to run an operation out of the hospital that Sonny Corinthos won't have a piece of, and if Steve helps him, he'll keep his career. Olivia Falconeri overhears the conversation and insists on talking to Johnny to protect Steve. Connie Falconeri, a personality of Kate Howard, propositions Johnny to get revenge on Sonny by pretending to have an affair with him, but Johnny declines.

1. Sonny reveals to his ex-wife, Alexis Davis, that he slept with Nelle Benson and kept it a secret from Carly. He apologizes for his actions and asks for forgiveness.
2. Ava Jerome informs her brother, Julian Jerome, that their sister, Olivia Jerome, is alive and has taken Alexis hostage. Olivia wants Julian to feel the same pain she felt when he killed her lover, Duke Lavery.
3. Curtis Ashford and Jason Morgan successfully disarm a bomb on the roof of General Hospital with the help of a bomb technician. They are hailed as heroes for potentially saving many lives.
4. Finn and Hayden Barnes are trapped in a supply closet during the hospital evacuation. Finn is experiencing withdrawal symptoms from a drug called Zen-Zen and Hayden helps him through it.
5. Sam Morgan is worried about her husband, Jason, who is inside the hospital with a bomb. Franco offers his support and Sam lashes out at him, blaming him for Jason's dangerous situation.
6. Olivia Jerome forces Julian to hold a gun to Alexis and threatens to kill her if he doesn't comply. Julian apologizes to Alexis and tells her to run, but Olivia shoots him before he can do anything.

1. Michael is angry that the man who attacked Abby, Brandon, is out on bail. Dante, who arrested Brandon, was not aware of this development and promises to look into it.
2. Luke feels responsible for the death of Jake, the son of Lucky Spencer, who was hit by a car while playing outside. Luke had been drinking and was driving the car that hit Jake.
3. Sonny tries to console Luke and tells him that Jake's death was an accident and that he should not blame himself. Sonny also tells Luke that he needs to give Lucky and Jason time to process their grief.
4. Patrick brings home potstickers for dinner, much to Robin's delight. Emma, their daughter, is with them and they all enjoy the meal together.
5. Carly and Shawn discuss the challenges of raising a child, with Carly sharing her experiences of dealing with her daughter's cancer and the loss of her son.
6. Dante informs Michael and Abby that Brandon has hired a new lawyer who is pushing for a trial. Abby is hesitant to testify and Michael becomes agitated, threatening to take matters into his own hands.
7. Suzanne, the mother of Brenda's deceased fiancé, surprises Theo with the news that their grandson is alive and on his way to see them. Theo had previously thought that his grandson had died with his son.
8. Brenda and Sonny discuss the loss of Jason's son and the need for them to put their differences aside for the sake of their children.
9. Elizabeth blames herself for Jake's death and Luke tries to reassure her that it was not her fault. Luke also reveals that he had been drinking the night of the accident.
10. Dante is concerned about Michael's state of mind and fears that he may take matters into his own hands if Brandon is not punished. Abby begs Michael not to do anything rash and to let the legal system handle it.

1. Alexis is concerned about Sam's relationship with Jason and the possibility of them having a baby together. She believes that the dangers of Jason's lifestyle make it a bad environment for a child.
2. Jax is trying to get full emergency custody of Josslyn by using a preliminary report that shows Shawn in a negative light. Shawn quits his job as a result.
3. Lisa has kidnapped Robin and trapped her in a basement with a gas leak. She plans to kill Robin and frame Patrick for her murder.
4. Brenda is having trouble adjusting to being a mother to Alec, especially since he seems to prefer Carly over her. She is also struggling with Sonny's secrecy and feels like she is not a priority in his life.
5. Carly is trying to convince Shawn not to quit his job as Josslyn's bodyguard, despite Jax's attempts to discredit him. She is worried about Josslyn's safety now that Shawn is no longer guarding her.
6. Alexis and Jason discuss Josslyn's custody case. Alexis is worried about the toll it is taking on Carly and Jason.
7. Kristina has been taking hydrocodone pills that were given to her by Lisa. She is not addicted, but is worried about what will happen if her mother finds out.
8. Sonny and Brenda are having marital problems due to Sonny's secrecy and Brenda's difficulty adjusting to life as a mother. Sonny is considering leaving Brenda for the sake of his son's safety.
9. Sam and Jason discuss the possibility of having a baby together. Sam wants to have a family, but is unsure if it is the right decision for her and Jason.
10. Carly is able to convince Shawn to stay on as Josslyn's bodyguard, at least until she can find someone else to take his place. She is determined to fight for custody of Josslyn and keep her safe from Franco.

1. Elizabeth is being attacked by Hayden, and Naomi, Hayden's estranged mother, unexpectedly arrives at the scene.
2. Franco checks in on Elizabeth, who is still grieving over Nikolas' disappearance and dealing with Hayden's hostility.
3. Lucas regains consciousness and shares his recollection of the attack with Jordan, Monica, Dr. Mayes, and Brad.
4. Nathan confesses to Maxie that he shot Claudette's lover years ago, causing her to question their relationship.
5. Naomi visits Hayden to offer help with the government investigation and to ask for help finding her stolen diamond necklace.
6. Elizabeth and Franco discuss Hayden, and Franco offers to help Elizabeth take revenge on her rival.
7. Jason and Sam suspect that Nikolas staged his own death to escape legal troubles, and they try to figure out how he did it.
8. Jordan investigates the doctors who were on call during the Nurses' Ball to find out who attacked Lucas.
9. Dr. Obrecht accuses Finn of being unfit to practice medicine due to his history of substance abuse, leading to a hospital-wide review of patient deaths.

1. Nikolas ends his relationship with Rebecca because he cannot stop seeing Emily in her. Rebecca is hurt and feels betrayed because she believed Nikolas truly cared for her.
2. Olivia is seeing Johnny Zacchara, which causes tension between her and Sonny. Olivia asks Carly to intervene and prevent Sonny from causing trouble for Johnny. Carly is skeptical that Sonny would actually hurt Johnny, but she agrees to talk to him. Sonny expresses his disapproval of Olivia seeing Johnny and asks Jason to keep an eye on him while they work together. Claudia also asks Johnny to help her get rid of Jason, who is convinced she was involved in Michael's shooting.

1. Georgie is in critical condition after a fall, and Maxie is losing her battle with renal failure caused by B.J.'s heart. Despite the gravity of the situation, Felicia refuses to give up hope and encourages Maxie to fight for her life. Dillon brings Georgie to see Maxie, and they share a heartfelt goodbye.
2. Emily confronts her fears about making love to Nikolas, and they ultimately decide to take the next step in their relationship. Meanwhile, Sonny questions Reese about her connection to Evan and her true intentions, and Ric is interrogated about his involvement in Evan's death.

1. Patrick struggles to change Jake's diaper, but Robin steps in to help. They discuss the possibility of Carly being pregnant and the potential challenges of raising a child together.
2. Sonny and Kate discuss the idea of a prenuptial agreement, with Kate expressing concern about Sonny's past legal issues and potential government investigations.
3. Jax and Carly argue about the possibility of Carly being pregnant, with Carly insisting she is not and Jax expressing his desire for them to have a baby together.
4. Lulu and Logan have a tense confrontation, with Logan trying to warn Lulu about the dangers of being involved with Johnny and the Zacchara family.
5. Jason takes care of Spinelli, who is delirious with a high fever. Spinelli talks about the conflict between Jason and Sonny and predicts that Sonny will try to take back control of the business.
6. Maxie and Johnny are stuck in an elevator and Maxie tries to flirt with Johnny, who is hesitant due to his relationship with Lulu. Maxie expresses her dislike for Lulu and her belief that Johnny would be better off with someone else.
7. Claudia and Spinelli discuss the conflict between Jason and Sonny, with Spinelli making ominous predictions about their future.
8. Kate and Sonny discuss their upcoming wedding and Kate expresses her desire to marry Sonny, despite the potential dangers.
9. Elizabeth brings Jake back to the hospital and Patrick accuses Robin and Elizabeth of setting him up to babysit Jake as a way to prove a point.
10. Maxie and Lulu argue about Lulu's relationship with Johnny and Maxie's dislike for Lulu. Maxie expresses concern for Lulu's mental health, given her family history.
1. Tracy insists on joining Luke in his quest to find Jerry Jacks, who has the cure for Luke's polonium

1. Patrick, a doctor, accidentally pricked himself during a surgical procedure on a patient with AIDS. He is advised to get tested for HIV and Hepatitis B and C, and to start post-exposure prophylaxes (PEP) immediately.
2. Nikolas thanks Alfred for trying to set him up with his ex-wife, Emily, but declines the offer, stating that it would not be fair to Emily. Alfred mentions that Nikolas' son still needs a mother.
3. Sonny is angry with his therapist, Dr. Winters, for suggesting that his mother is to blame for the abuse he suffered as a child. He gets into an argument with Emily, who tries to calm him down.
4. Carly intervenes in the argument and sides with Emily. She tells Sonny that he needs to accept the reality of his childhood trauma and work through it in therapy.
5. Nikolas and Emily take a walk with Nikolas' son, John. Emily expresses her gratitude for Nikolas' help in saving her from a difficult situation.
6. Sonny confides in Carly about his feelings for Emily and his guilt over not being able to protect her from his emotional instability.
7. Patrick is informed that he will need to take anti-retroviral drugs for four weeks and undergo another blood test in January. Robin, a nurse, offers him support and advice.
8. Sam is stuck in an elevator with Jason, her ex-boyfriend. She vents to him about her frustrating day and he offers to help her study for her G.E.D. test.
9. Carly and Sonny discuss Sonny's childhood trauma and his mother's role in it. Carly encourages Sonny to continue therapy and work through his issues.
10. Lucky confides in Elizabeth about his guilt over not being the one to kill Manny, the criminal he was chasing, and Jason taking the credit. Elizabeth reassures him that he is still a hero in her eyes.

1. Sam calls Dr. Finn to get the test results for malaria, which she and Jason might have contracted during their trip to Greece. She is worried about passing it along to her unborn child.
2. Elizabeth informs Sam that malaria is not passed from person to person like a cold or flu, and the only way a mother can pass it on to her child is in utero, during pregnancy.
3. Kevin and Laura receive their test results, which show that neither of them has malaria.
4. Kristina tells Aaron about her relationship with Parker, a married woman, and how she lied to him about her feelings for Parker. She apologizes for her behavior.
5. Alexis visits Julian in prison and asks him to speak to the Bar Association on her behalf, as it might mean the difference between her being disbarred or not.
6. Julian agrees to help Alexis in exchange for her helping him cut a deal with the authorities to avoid a trial.
7. Jordan and Andre have breakfast together and agree to work on their relationship issues.
8. Sam finds out that she doesn't have malaria, but she is pregnant. She asks Elizabeth not to tell Jason yet, as she wants to find out what her options are before telling him.

1. Lucky Spencer, played by Jonathan Jackson, is struggling with addiction and cheating on his wife, Elizabeth, with Maxie. Emily and Nikolas are trying to help him, but he pushes them away.
2. Sam, played by Kelly Monaco, slept with her stepfather, Ric, in a drunken and self-destructive act. She plans to tell Jason, but Ric warns her that Jason will despise her for it.
3. Elizabeth, played by Rebecca Herbst, finds comfort in Jason after finding out about Lucky's affair. They share a moment, but Elizabeth knows it can only be one night.
4. Sonny, played by Maurice Benard, has a heart-to-heart with Alexis about the importance of communication in a marriage. He also warns Ric about the consequences of his actions and tells him to take care of his family.

1. Molly helps TJ fix a wedding cake for Sonny and Carly's wedding, but they struggle to make it perfect. Meanwhile, Michael talks to Sabrina about Morgan's behavior and his own feelings towards Sonny.
2. Carly and Jason discuss Sonny's bipolar disorder and how it has affected their lives. Jason mentions that he understands Sonny better now.
3. Morgan opens up to Sonny about his feelings of inadequacy and self-hatred. Sonny reassures him of his love and support, and encourages him to seek medical help if he wants to.
4. Sam tells Jason about a major break in the case against Nikolas, thanks to Anna Devane's help. Nikolas and Hayden plan to spend the day together by the pool.

1. Sonny Corinthos has been shot and is being attended to by medics. Jason, Sam, and TJ are at the scene, and they are trying to keep him alive until the ambulance arrives. TJ feels responsible for Sonny's shooting because he was the one who called Sonny to the scene of the crime.
2. Anna Devane is trying to get Sloane to turn over Nikolas Cassadine to the authorities for tampering with the mayoral election. Sloane refuses to do so, and Anna tells him that he is not immune from prosecution. Sloane threatens to take Anna down with him if he goes to prison.
3. Carly is getting ready for her wedding to Sonny, but he has not yet arrived. She is convinced that he is off preparing a surprise for her, but in reality, he has been shot and is fighting for his life. The wedding goes on without him, and Carly is surrounded by her loved ones who wish her well.

1. Sam and Silas discuss Silas's daughter, Kiki. Silas is unsure if Kiki wants to have a relationship with him, and Sam urges him to think about what he wants.
2. Tracy and Ava watch a TV show about Franco, who has been exonerated of all charges due to his tumor affecting his ability to tell right from wrong. Kiki wants to see Franco, and Michael offers to drive her to the Quartermaines' house.
3. Britt goes into labor and gives birth at Wyndemere. Sabrina delivers the baby, and Britt is worried about her son's breathing issues. Nikolas and Sabrina take the baby to the hospital.
4. Morgan talks to Sonny about Connie's death and takes responsibility for it, but Sonny reassures him that it's not his fault.
5. TJ and Molly reunite, and TJ asks Molly to get back together with him.
6. Franco tells Ava that he no longer cares about ELQ or making the family pay, and his heart belongs to someone else. Tracy allows Franco to kick Ava out of the house.

1. Jerry Jacks has taken Alexis Davis hostage and is planning to escape with her on a boat. Sonny Corinthos and Jax are determined to rescue Alexis and stop Jerry. Meanwhile, Tracy Quartermaine learns that her father, Edward, is not dead as she had been led to believe, but is close to death due to the pathogen in the water.
2. Monica Quartermaine informs Tracy that there is only one dose of the antiserum available, which was synthesized using Tracy's blood. Tracy insists that her father should receive the dose, but Monica explains that she cannot ignore federal guidelines and must follow protocol.
3. Meanwhile, Dante Falconeri and John McBain are trying to defuse a bomb attached to the antiserum. They struggle to disconnect the timer from the explosive, and McBain realizes that it is a more complicated task than he had anticipated.
4. In the midst of the chaos, Jerry reveals to Jax that he is dying from radiation sickness caused by a bullet laced with polonium-210. He explains that he has been working to find a cure, but the cost is exorbitant. Jax pleads with Jerry to let him protect him and find a way out of the situation, but Jerry ultimately decides to leave on his own.

1. Tracy suggests having grilled salmon for dinner, and Paul agrees. Paul is distracted and avoids looking at Tracy, who notices something is wrong. Paul reveals that he has just mailed his divorce papers, and the finality of it has hit him.
2. Ava is desperate to find a flash drive that contains incriminating evidence against her. She believes that Ric Lansing has stolen it and threatens to recharge Ava with Connie's murder. Scott, Ava's lawyer, reminds her that she still owes him $5 million for his services.
3. Carly is worried about Morgan, who has been acting erratically since his father was shot. Michael reveals that Morgan has a gun and intends to kill Julian Jerome. Carly insists on finding Morgan and talking him out of it, fearing it will destroy his life.
4. Dillon's movie production is halted due to a lack of permits. Tracy and Paul offer to help, and Paul reveals that he knows Mayor Lomax from law school. Paul believes he can use his connection to get the permits reinstated.
5. Patrick's birthday party is in full swing. Emma has organized a surprise party, and Patrick is touched by the effort everyone has put in. Sam gives him a guitar as a present, and they share a moment.
6. Michael continues to search for Morgan, who is determined to kill Julian. TJ refuses to reveal Julian's location, insisting that it is Sonny's business, not Morgan's.
7. Ava is surprised by Paul, who offers to help her find the missing flash drive. Meanwhile, Patrick proposes to Sam, who happily accepts.

1. Sonny Corinthos is getting married to Kate Howard, but there are several interruptions during the wedding ceremony. Olivia, who has been having hallucinations, interrupts the ceremony to give a speech about Kate and Sonny's history together. Later, Trey, Kristina's husband, interrupts to ask if anyone has seen Kristina. It is revealed that Kristina and Trey had a fight and she did not show up to the wedding. Meanwhile, Joe Jr., Trey's father, has kidnapped Kristina and is holding her hostage in Sonny's warehouse. He plans to kill her and make it look like one of Sonny's enemies did it, so that Trey will inherit all of Kristina's money.
2. Meanwhile, Jason Morgan finds out that the DNA test results he received about Sam's baby were wrong. The baby that died the night of the storm was not Sam's. Sam's child is still alive and is living with Téa Delgado in Llanview. Jason confronts Elizabeth, who admits that she deliberately gave him the wrong results because she didn't want Sam's baby to bring Jason and Sam back together. Elizabeth is struggling with the loss of her own child and is trying to move on, but she doesn't want Sam's baby to be the reason why she and Jason get back together.
3. Back at the wedding, Connie, Kate's alternate personality, interrupts the ceremony to reveal that she is already married. She is married to Joe Jr., who is holding Kristina hostage. Joe Jr. plans to kill Kristina and make it look like one of Sonny's enemies did it, so that Trey will inherit all of Kristina's money. Connie's revelation throws a wrench in Sonny and Kate's wedding plans, and it is unclear what will happen next.

1. Claudia and Johnny are discussing their living arrangements and reminiscing about their past when Johnny brings up Claudia's upcoming marriage to Sonny Corinthos. Claudia reveals that she is doing it for Johnny's benefit, to strengthen his position in the organization and ensure that he will have a powerful empire to run when he takes over.
2. Sonny and Anthony Zacchara are discussing the terms of Sonny's takeover of the Zacchara organization. Sonny insists that he will be in charge and that nobody will have authority over him. Anthony agrees, but also expects to be advised of Sonny's overall strategies as boss emeritus.
3. Jason and Spinelli are discussing the Russian mob and their recent attack on Sam. Jason is concerned about the safety of Elizabeth and the boys, and Spinelli offers his support. Jason tells Spinelli that they need to take coordinated action to force the Russians out and prevent further damage.
4. Claudia and Johnny are discussing Claudia's upcoming marriage to Sonny. Johnny is against the marriage and tries to convince Claudia not to go through with it, but Claudia insists that it is for Johnny's benefit and that she will make sure he has a powerful empire to run when he takes over the organization.

1. Jason, Max, and Sam discuss Franco and his recent appearance at his art studio. Franco has been sending Jason pictures and has made it clear that he wants to meet him. Jason is determined to confront Franco and find out what he wants, despite Sam's concerns that it may be a trap.
2. Sonny and Carly discuss how to handle the situation with Michael, who is struggling after killing Claudia. Sonny wants Michael to come live with him, but Carly is opposed to the idea. They argue about the best way to protect Michael and keep him out of trouble.
3. Olivia and Johnny discuss their relationship and the complications that come with it. Olivia is in love with Sonny, which causes tension between her and Johnny. Despite this, they both want to be together and are willing to work through their issues.
4. Rebecca and Ethan discuss Nikolas and the recent accident involving Rebecca. Ethan believes that Nikolas tried to kill Rebecca on purpose, but Rebecca is not so sure. She is still trying to process what happened and figure out her next steps.
5. Steve, Elizabeth's brother, visits Rebecca in the hospital. He is protective of Elizabeth and is wary of Rebecca's intentions. He encourages Rebecca to let go of any grudges and move on from the past.
6. Maxie is trying to redecorate Jason's house and is excited about the "Crimson" photo shoot. She wants Jason to mention the shoot to Franco, but Sam is not on board with the idea. Sam is worried about Jason's safety and does not want him to get distracted by Maxie's request.

1. Maxie is overjoyed that Robin is alive but is still struggling with her emotions and thoughts of self-harm. Spinelli and Ellie are adjusting to being new parents and considering moving to Portland, Oregon for Ellie's job. Maxie has told them to take the baby and go, which has caused conflict with Robin. Carly and Lulu discuss the loss of Lulu's baby and how Dante is to blame in Lulu's eyes. Carly suggests that Lulu and Dante need each other to heal, but Lulu is not ready to talk to Dante.

2. Franco has killed his mother, Heather Webber, and is seeking help from Kevin. He is worried about the legal consequences and the impact on his relationship with Carly. Kevin agrees to take him on as a patient and help him work through his issues. Lulu considers hiring Franco at the Haunted Star, but is hesitant due to their past history. Carly asks Lulu to consider hiring him and to give Franco a chance. Lulu agrees to think about it.

1. Carly is not being released from Roselawn for Christmas, and she is upset about it. She wants Emily to spend Christmas with her sons, Michael and Morgan, but Emily has plans with Nikolas. Sonny, Carly's husband, does not want Nikolas in his house because he feels that Nikolas took advantage of Emily and Courtney in the past.
2. Alexis has been appointed to defend Manny Ruiz, a man facing criminal charges and recovering from brain surgery at General Hospital. Alexis wants to argue that Manny's criminal behavior was caused by a brain anomaly and that he should not be held responsible for his crimes. However, this goes against the wishes of D.A. Durant, who wants to convict Manny.

1. Gus discovers he has a son, Rafael, with his ex-girlfriend Natalia. He is 16 years old and a fan of the Chicago Cubs.
2. Beth wants to spend time with her daughter Lizzie, but Alan is overly protective and wants to spend every moment with Beth and the unborn baby.

1. Lizzie reveals to Ava that she knows about her visit to a fertility clinic, causing an argument.
2. Rick decides not to host the annual Bauer barbecue due to his recent breakup with Beth.
3. Beth regrets her decision to end things with Rick and wants to convince him to have the barbecue.
4. Alan falls in the park and injures himself but insists on attending the barbecue.
5. Rick arrives at the barbecue hosted by Cassie and Josh, and Beth joins him for a walk.
6. Lizzie and Remy have a conversation, with Lizzie mentioning that Ava's baby is not Bill's.
7. Bill and Ava attend the barbecue, and Bill becomes uncomfortable when Ava tries to kiss him.
8. Mallet gives a speech about the importance of unity and the American dream, followed by the singing of "Yankee Doodle Dandy."

1. Cassie and Jeffrey are planning to attend a party and awards ceremony, but Cassie is also responsible for throwing a kids' party for her son RJ on the same night. Cassie wants Jeffrey to come to RJ's party, but Jeffrey is hesitant because he has to wear a tuxedo and receive an award at the other event. They eventually compromise and Jeffrey agrees to come over to Cassie's place after the awards ceremony for cake and ice cream.
2. Reva has discovered that her son Jonathan's adoptive father, Alfred, is actually the man who has been beating Jonathan. She wants to keep Alfred away from Jonathan and get justice for her son and Olivia's sister Marissa, who was also hurt by Alfred. Olivia is hesitant to trust Reva, but eventually agrees to help her figure out a way to "nail" Alfred.

1. Alan Spaulding confesses to shooting his son Phillip in order to protect his family and their assets.
2. Lizzie, Phillip's daughter, confronts her grandfather about the shooting and he eventually admits to it.
3. Cassie seeks Jonathan's help in proving that Edmund is an unfit parent in order to keep her baby away from him.
4. Dinah loses her baby and tells Edmund, who is devastated by the news.
5. Edmund still wants to be with Cassie, but she tells him that they can't get back together and need to focus on co-parenting their child.
6. Alexandra reveals that she has physical evidence linking Alan to the shooting - a pair of gloves with Phillip's blood on them.
7. Alan is arrested and taken into custody for the murder of Phillip Spaulding.
8. Dinah struggles with getting over her love for Edmund and Jonathan gives her advice on how to move on.
9. Cassie and Edmund discuss the future of their relationship and whether they can co-parent effectively.

1. Shayne Lewis, a professional baseball player, is enjoying his newfound fame but is also feeling overwhelmed by the constant attention. He wants to spend some quality time with his girlfriend, Marina Cooper, before he has to leave for training camp.
2. Ben Reade, a friend of Cassie Winslow, is trying to visit his dying grandmother but is being prevented from doing so by Gus Aitoro, a detective who suspects Ben of being involved in a recent murder. Ben remembers smelling a certain cologne right before he was attacked, and Gus recognizes it as the same cologne worn by Mitch Hendon, who is now a suspect in the murder of his wife.
3. Eden August, another friend of Cassie's, is being accused of murder and is trying to prove her innocence. She enlists the help of Tony Santucci, who offers to help her find the real killer.
4. Cassie Winslow is dealing with the aftermath of Jeffrey O'Neill, who has been kicked out of the Beacon hotel for being too honest. She is also trying to help Ben visit his grandmother and is frustrated with Gus's interference.

1. Alexandra is hosting a fundraiser and Cyrus is helping her. Alexandra wants Cyrus to know that she doesn't plan to head the family alone.
2. Cyrus and Alexandra discuss the success of the fundraiser and the donations they have received. Cyrus calls Kelly, who is in charge of the donation table, to help log the donations.
3. Frank, Harley, and Marina are also at the fundraiser. Frank is overprotective of his daughter, Marina, and doesn't want her to go to the fundraiser alone.
4. Natalia and Alan are also at the fundraiser. Natalia is seeing Remy, but Alan still has feelings for her. Gus is suspicious of Alan's intentions towards Natalia.
5. Cyrus is stealing the donations from the fundraiser. Marina is working at the fundraiser and catches Cyrus stealing. She confronts him and Cyrus tries to downplay his actions.
6. Mallet and Dinah are at the fundraiser together. Dinah's mother, Vanessa, shows up with Billy. Dinah is upset that her mother is with Billy and not Matt.
7. Gus and Natalia dance together at the fundraiser. Gus and Alan get into an argument about Natalia.
8. Matt shows up at the fundraiser and sees Vanessa with Billy. He is upset and confronts Vanessa.
9. Frank finds out that Mallet took money from an envelope in his desk. Frank is angry and tells Mallet that he can't give him a second chance.

1. Shayne is missing and Reva is worried about him. Josh and Jeffrey are trying to help her find him.
2. Beth is torn about her relationship with Coop, who is Buzz's son. Buzz warns her not to hurt his son's feelings.
3. Lizzie is not going to China with her family because she wants to stay with Bill, who is being investigated for a crime.
4. Coop invites Beth to go to Telluride with him, but she is hesitant because of her children and Alan.
5. Shayne has returned and is talking to Remy. He needs to get on a plane as soon as possible.
6. Buzz finds out that Coop is writing a novel about an affair between a younger man and an older woman, and he warns Coop not to mess with Alan Spaulding's woman.

1. Todd and Blair express their love and forgiveness for each other, with Blair stating that she has wanted to be with Todd for a long time. Meanwhile, Cristian, Antonio, and Natalie discuss the threat of Mitch Laurence and Natalie reveals that she has to sleep with him.
2. Max and Roxy finalize their divorce, with Max expressing regret and Roxy stating that she is taking the money and running. Rae outsmarts Asa by keeping the divorce papers and negotiating a better settlement, leaving Asa frustrated.

1. Jessica is getting ready for Chloe's christening and reflects on how her daughter has helped her heal from Nash's death. She also mentions that she met a boy in St. Ann's.
2. Clint and Viki discuss Nora and Matthew. Clint mentions that Nora is coming to the service and he hopes the joy will help bridge some gaps.
3. Starr and Cole discuss the night Zach Rosen took them hostage. Cole mentions that he was at the Buchanan mansion to talk to Todd about Starr and Mr. Joplin.
4. Markko tells Langston that Cole was freaked out because rehab pulled a drug test on him and he took a painkiller. Cole asked Markko for a sample to substitute, and Markko gave it to him.
5. Starr tells Cole that their baby didn't die from Rh disease, as they were previously told. Michael confirmed this after Marcie saw Cole's blood test and asked him to double check it.
6. Natalie tells Viki that she had to make sure she had forgiven Jessica before agreeing to be Chloe's godmother. Natalie also mentions that she will do anything to keep her sister healthy.
7. Brody tells Jessica that he is sorry for hurting her and wishes she would forgive him. Jessica tells him that it's too hard right now and she can't be friends with him when he's with Gigi.
8. Nora tells Bo that the blood on the knife is Blair's, but they were only able to pull a partial print and it's not Rosen's. The partial print is John McBain's.

1. Dorian and Kelly discuss Reed Wagner, a man Kelly knew in London who is now in Llanview. Dorian mentions that Reed seemed to know a lot about Kelly and offers his condolences regarding Kelly's mother's death.
2. Rex is searching for his biological parents and shows Natalie a necklace that was wrapped in his blanket when he was abandoned at the hospital. He has sent photos of it to jewelers across the country in hopes of finding more information.
3. Jessica is going to the prom with Brody, and Clint expresses his concern about Jessica getting her heart broken. Reed, a man Clint met through B.E. business in London, stops by and meets Jessica.
4. Natalie is relieved to be off the hook for pushing Marty Saybrooke down the stairs, as Todd has been arrested for the crime. Brody mentions that he doesn't think John actually believed Natalie was guilty.
5. Dani confronts Todd about pushing Cole's mother down the stairs and killing her baby. Todd denies the allegations and tries to convince Dani that he has changed and deserves a chance to get to know her.
6. Blair discovers that Téa is dying and is determined to tell Dani the truth.

1. Natalie and Paul are at a bar, and Natalie wants to get a bottle of champagne. Paul is suspicious that Natalie might be trying to avoid someone or something. Natalie insists that he is the only thing on her mind.
2. Kelly is worried that Paul will find out that a baby is missing, and she is questioning him about where he got Ace from. Kevin is trying to find Viki, who is not in her room. Jessica tells Todd that Viki is not there and that she is worried because Viki received bad news from her angiogram.
3. Jessica calls Kevin to tell him that Viki had a coronary and is at the hospital. John has Dr. Long in his office to discuss the organ harvesting. Michael thinks that Dr. Long is stalking him, and John tells him that without proof, there is nothing he can do.
4. Marcie and Jen return home and find that a window in Michael's house is broken. Michael tells them that the wind must have broken it, but Marcie is suspicious. Michael tells them about a dream he had that Dr. Long broke in while he was sleeping.
5. Marcie decides to go to Dr. Long's office to find evidence to put him away. Michael tries to stop her, but she leaves. Natalie is in bed when John calls her and tells her that he thinks he can move on and wants to see her.
6. Viki is at the hospital after having a coronary. She tells her children and Dorian that she heard them praying for her and that their voices brought her back. John calls Michael to ask if he has seen Marcie, and Michael tells him that she went to Dr. Long's office.
7. Paul is with Kelly, who has taken sleeping pills and passed out. David accuses Paul of trying to hurt Kelly, but Paul insists that he was only trying to put a pillow under her head. David gets into a physical fight with Paul, who eventually falls to the ground unconscious.

1. Blair is frustrated with the Chicago Police Department's lack of concern about Todd's disappearance. John has invited Miles Laurence to listen to a recording related to the case.
2. Jessica confesses to Antonio that she is in love with Nash, and their marriage is over. Antonio is heartbroken and feels betrayed.
3. Cristian knew about Jessica and Nash's affair but didn't tell Antonio, causing a rift in their relationship.
4. Marty is attacked by three men while on her way to Cherryvale. John suspects Miles of being involved due to a series of coincidences.
5. Clint and Viki discuss Jessica's situation, feeling helpless as they can't find a donor for her liver transplant.
6. Dorian and Blair discuss the terrible news about Jessica, and Blair decides to get tested as a potential donor.
7. Viki and Clint search for experimental procedures or treatments for liver cancer, hoping to find something that will help Jessica.

1. Nora is surprised to find Clint at her house instead of staying over at Dorian's as planned. Clint explains that Dorian decided to bunk in with David Vickers and Viki instead.
2. David Vickers tries to convince Viki to sleep with him, but Viki refuses.
3. John books Marty and Cole into a hotel room for the night to keep her safe from Laurence.
4. Sarah is questioned by Blair, Rex, Cristian, and a detective about Todd's disappearance and Hunter's involvement.
5. Marcie and Michael discuss the possibility of having another child.
6. Dorian regrets her actions after going to Viki's house and finding David there.
7. Viki allows David to stay at Llanfair but insists that he wear clothes and stop his campaign to sleep with her.
8. Marty confronts Miles about his involvement in Laurence's blackmail.
9. Blair decides to stay in Chicago to find Todd, with Rex and Cristian's help.

1. Viki is at the last place Natalie was seen before she disappeared, looking for answers. She confronts Marcie about her book and its potential role in Natalie's disappearance.
2. Marcie admits that the idea for burning two cheerleaders alive came from a journal in her old "Killing Club" from high school. She insists that she never actually planned to kill anyone, but Viki is skeptical.
3. Rex is frantically trying to get in touch with Bo to find out what the police are doing to find Natalie. He is feeling guilty for his role in her disappearance.
4. Nora is worried that she may have contracted H.I.V. from Daniel, and she is waiting for test results. Bo is supportive and tries to reassure her.
5. Todd has information about Jessica, but he is not willing to share it with Viki or Antonio. He thinks Jessica is in trouble, but he does not want to involve the police.
6. John is working on the case and trying to get inside the killer's head. He and Marcie discuss the killer's motivations and what he might hope to gain by holding Natalie hostage.
7. Lindsay tries to reassure Rex that he is a good person and that he has changed for the better. She encourages him to keep fighting and to stay positive.
8. Nora's test results come back negative, and Bo is relieved. Nora is still worried about the possibility of contracting H.I.V. from Daniel, but she is one step closer to putting that part of her life behind her.
9. Todd convinces Bo not to tell Viki about his suspicions about Jessica's safety. Bo agrees to keep it between them and to focus on finding Natalie.
10. Marcie agrees to make some phone calls to old "Killing Club" members to see if they have any information that might help the investigation. John thanks her and asks her to make the calls from the station for safety reasons.

1. In a scene between Tess and Nash, Tess expresses her desire to stay in her new life and be free from her old one. Nash encourages her to find her own dreams and consider starting a vineyard of her own.
2. In a conversation between Blair and her daughter Starr, Blair apologizes for spying on Starr's instant messages and Starr expresses her frustration with her social life and wishes for a different family.
3. In a scene with Todd and his lawyer Rich, Todd inquires about setting up a stock portfolio for his niece Jessica and offers a large commission for Rich if he can help him get in touch with her. Rich reveals that he has already spoken with Jessica and will meet with her that night.

1. Asa Buchanan and Kevin Buchanan discuss how to handle Willy Dawes, who they believe is responsible for trying to harm Kevin's wife, Kelly. Asa wants to find damaging information about Dawes, while Kevin wants to handle the situation legally.
2. David Vickers shows up at Rodi's, where Kelly is having dinner with Dorian Lord. David tells Kelly that Dorian sent him to talk to her, but Kelly is skeptical.
3. Dorian calls Blair Cramer to inform her of a problem at home, causing Blair to leave Kelly and David alone. David tries to persuade Kelly to help him win Dorian's affections.
4. Antonio Vega is in family court, fighting for joint custody of his daughter Jamie with Keri Reynolds. Evangeline Williamson is representing Antonio, while R.J. Gannon, Keri's father, is representing Keri.
5. R.J. and Keri are worried that Antonio will be granted joint custody, as they believe he is a danger to Jamie. Evangeline tries to reassure them that the judge will make a fair decision.
6. Marcie Walsh is visiting her boyfriend, Al Holden, in the hospital. Al is suffering from liver failure, and Marcie is worried about him.
7. Todd Manning surprises Blair by playing the piano and singing to her. Blair is touched by Todd's gesture, but she is hesitant to get too close to him.
8. David continues to try to woo Kelly, but she is not interested. Kevin shows up and tells David to leave Kelly alone.
9. Cristian Vega meets with Asa, who asks him to find a woman who can help them take down Dawes. Cristian is reluctant, but Asa insists.
10. The judge grants joint custody to Antonio and Keri, much to R.J.'s dismay. Evangeline thanks the judge and leaves the courtroom with Antonio.

1. Rex is found in the women's steam room by Kelly, but he claims it's not the women's steam room.
2. Gigi is upset with Rex because he told his ex-wife that they are not having sex.
3. Adriana and Layla are asked to help with the new men's line at their job, even though it's not their responsibility.
4. Natalie had an amniocentesis test, but did not tell John. John is upset because he was not included in the decision.
5. Eddie, Ford and James' father, shows up unexpectedly and wants to stay with them. He is not welcome.
6. Starr and Cole say their goodbyes as Cole is being taken to prison.
7. Markko and Langston say their goodbyes as Markko is returning to UCLA.
8. Cole talks to his daughter, Hope, and tells her a story about a party from 4 years ago.
9. Rex asks Kelly to be his escort to Todd and Téa's party.
10. Inez takes Eddie and forces him to leave the house.

1. Whitney, a character in the source document, is discussing her desire to become a singer with Chad, who is helping her record a demo. Whitney's mother and Julian Crane are mentioned as being against Whitney's desire to sing.
2. Eve, another character, is confronted by Liz about her appearance and is accused of being on drugs or having an affair with Julian Crane. Eve denies these accusations.
3. Gwen and Rebecca are discussing their plan to adopt Theresa's son and destroy Theresa's family. Rebecca has gotten Pilar and Miguel fired from the cannery and Luis suspended from the police force.
4. Luis, Pilar, Miguel, and Theresa are discussing their financial struggles and the possibility of Luis finding work with a friend's security company. Theresa mentions that Rebecca has been mistreating little Ethan.
5. Whitney and Chad are discussing her desire to become a singer and how it is not related to her anger towards her mother. Whitney's father, T.C., is mentioned as being supportive of her tennis career.
6. Rebecca is discussing her plan to evict Pilar and her family from their home with Ethan. Ethan is uncomfortable with this and tries to find a way to help the family.
7. Rebecca threatens to fire Ethan if he does not follow through with evicting Pilar and her family. She also brings up Ethan's past indiscretions with Theresa and how it has affected Gwen.
8. T.C. has been researching the reason for Whitney's recent behavior and believes it is due to her disappointment in Chad. Eve is worried about Whitney getting back into the music industry.

1. Sheridan, a character who has been through a lot already, is in the hospital after a fire at her home. The fire is suspected to be arson, and Antonio, her husband, is determined to find out who tried to kill his bride. Meanwhile, Theresa is worried that the arsonist may have a vendetta against the Cranes and could go after Little Ethan.
2. Tom Joyner, a whistleblower from Crane Industries, is in Harmony and has a score to settle with Julian. He holds him responsible for stealing from his own workers and robbing them of their hope and spirit. Rebecca, who has her own agenda, tries to help Julian change Tom's mind, but Tom is determined to get his revenge.

1. Whitney has given up her baby for adoption, causing conflict between her parents, T.C. and Eve, and their respective partners, Liz and Julian.
2. T.C. and Liz propose to adopt Whitney's baby, while Eve and Julian consider the same idea.
3. Tabitha is excited about the potential conflict between the four adults over the adoption.
4. Meanwhile, Luis and Beth are dealing with Sheridan's insistence that Marty is her child, despite Beth's claims that he is her son with Luis.
5. Sheridan wants a DNA test to prove that Marty is her child, but Beth refuses to allow it.
6. On a separate island, Ethan and Fox are trying to escape from their captors and find Gwen and Theresa, who are fighting over Jane, Ethan's child with Theresa.
7. Gwen threatens to kill Theresa, but Katherine intervenes and manages to calm her down.
8. Back in Harmony, Spike harasses Jessica, leading Sam to threaten him.

1. Whitney and Chad are planning to move to LA together, and Whitney's mother, who was previously against the idea, has now changed her mind. This has caused a rift between Whitney's parents, T.C. and Eve.
2. It is revealed that Eve encouraged Whitney to go to LA with Chad in order to protect her from Liz, who is trying to ruin Eve's life. T.C. is upset and feels betrayed by Eve's actions.
3. Meanwhile, Sheridan has left Harmony and is in Paris. She was under a lot of stress and needed to get away. Her husband, Luis, is concerned about her and wants to find her, but Sheridan does not want to be found.
4. There was a fire at a club in Harmony, and it is revealed that it was arson. Whitney, Chad, Fox, and Theresa were inside the club and almost died. Julian admits to setting the fire, but claims it was an accident.
5. Kay, a character who is pregnant, goes into labor early. Her water breaks and she is taken to the hospital. Her family is worried about her and the baby's health.
6. Tabitha, a character who is known for being evil, is pregnant with a demon child. Charity, a good character, discovers the truth and wants to warn everyone.

1. Spike, Noah, Sam, Paloma, Simone, and Jessica are having an intervention for Jessica to convince her to testify against Spike for his abuse.
2. Endora, Maria, Tabitha, Fox, and Miguel are discussing where Maria got chocolate from and how Endora helped her get it.
3. Fancy and Chris are discussing the undercover sting operation that was shown on the news, and Fancy is worried about how Sheridan will react.
4. Luis and Sheridan are discussing their undercover sting operation and how it looked like they were having sex on TV.
5. Jared, Theresa, Rebecca, Ethan, and Gwen are all at the same hotel, and there is a mix-up with lovemaking sounds coming from different rooms.
6. Spike is trying to convince Jessica not to testify against him, and Sam, Noah, Paloma, and Simone are trying to convince her to.
7. Miguel and Kay end up in a mysterious place together after Miguel wishes to spend time alone with her, and they enjoy their time together.

1. Kay and Miguel are in love and plan to marry, but they are worried about how to tell Fox, Kay's current fiancé, about their plans.
2. Rebecca is pretending to be Gwen in order to keep Ethan from realizing that Gwen is gone. She is doing this so that Gwen can pay off J.T. to leave town.
3. Gwen and Theresa are both trying to pay J.T. to get information from him about Ethan. They both want Ethan to believe that the other one is lying to him.
4. Luis, Sheridan, Paloma, and Chris are searching for Fancy, who has gone missing. Chris is acting suspiciously, which makes Luis suspect that he had something to do with Fancy's disappearance.
5. Fox is pretending to be sick in order to keep Kay from leaving him for Miguel. He wants to make sure that Kay is happy for as long as possible before he dies.
6. Rebecca is trying to have sex with Ethan, thinking that it will be a good way to pass the time while she waits for Gwen to come back.
7. Gwen has paid J.T. more money than Theresa has, so she wins the competition and gets to be with Ethan.
8. Fox has found out that he is dying, and he doesn't want to tell Kay because he doesn't want to ruin her happiness. Miguel thinks that Kay should tell Fox the truth, but she doesn't want to hurt him.

1. Karen and Colleen are discussing a patient's medication, linoxin, and plan to decrease the dosage and monitor the patient's response. Karen is called away and Kevin approaches Colleen, asking for help with his drug addiction.
2. Ian, a vampire, is struggling with his desire to feed on Lucy. He reveals to Chris, a doctor helping him, that he needs more blood to resist feeding on Lucy. Chris agrees to help him, suspecting that Lucy is the specific person Ian is struggling not to feed on.
3. Lucy has lost her slayer powers and feels useless as a result. Elizabeth approaches her for help finding Alison, who has been taken by Joshua. Lucy initially refuses, but Elizabeth appeals to her sense of responsibility towards Alison, who considers Lucy a mother figure.
4. Kevin is struggling with his addiction to a drug he believes to be vitamins and herbs. He wants to know the ingredients so he can continue taking it, but Karen refuses to enable his addiction. Kevin becomes increasingly desperate, begging Karen for help.
5. Joshua explains his past friendship with Alison's father, Malcolm, and how it turned sour as he grew older. Alison accuses him of being part of the plan to kill her father, but Joshua denies it.
6. Rafe confronts Jamal, a newly turned vampire, about Alison's whereabouts. Jamal refuses to help, leading to a physical altercation. Lisa, a nurse, finds Jamal and offers to help, but he refuses.

1. Sharon is trying to prove that her sister Skye is still alive, but the law enforcement in Hawaii doesn't believe her and is considering obstruction charges. Adam is confident that Sharon didn't interfere with the investigation and offers to take a lie detector test.
2. Nick is back from a trip to Telluride and Victor reveals that he went there to get away from his family problems. Nick is upset that Victor didn't tell anyone where he was going.
3. Daisy, who is in prison, has escaped and Daniel has gone missing while looking for her. Michael and Jack are searching for them and have put out an A.P.B. on Daisy and Jana's car.
4. Sharon asks Victor for help in proving Adam's innocence, but Victor refuses, saying that Adam created the situation he's in. Sharon is determined to set things right and asks Victor if he was the one who sent Skye out of town.
5. Neil and Sofia are upset with Blake for doing a poor job on a rush assignment. They plan to fire him and tell Cane to find out what happened.
6. Colin wants to see his grandchildren and Blake offers to go with him to Cane and Lily's house. Lily makes an excuse and says it's not a good time.
7. Jill is trying to cancel Lauren's appointments for the day and Nick tells Sharon that he is filing for full custody of Faith.
8. Michael receives a photo of Daisy taken less than an hour ago at an A.T.M. just over the Canadian border. The Mounties are looking for someone who is very pregnant.

1. Victor Newman and his daughters, Victoria and Abby, are in a legal battle over the ownership of Newman Enterprises.
2. Victor's company is being audited by forensic accountants to determine the value of the trusts belonging to Victoria and Abby, as well as the company's subsidiary in Dubai.
3. Victoria and Abby's lawyer, Vance Abrams, is trying to freeze one-third of Newman Enterprises' assets due to Victor's plan to sell a major holding in Dubai, which would devalue the company.
4. Michael Baldwin, Victor's lawyer, argues that there is no evidence of wrongdoing in the accountants' report and that Vance is making false claims.
5. Victor accuses Victoria of lying and betraying him, as she had misled the Savaneur stockholders about his health during her trip to Dubai.
6. Sharon is trying to prove that Skye Lockhart is alive and in Hawaii, as this would help Adam's case, who is accused of killing her.
7. Jack is in Hawaii, searching for evidence of Skye's presence on the island. He finds a bottle of her rare perfume in the ashes of a burned-down shack.
8. Heather is subpoenaed to testify in the trial of Owen Pomerantz, the former district attorney accused of running a drug ring out of the former D.A.'s office.
9. Heather is worried about the prosecution's secret witness, as she doesn't know who it is and is afraid it might backfire.
10. Paul is helping Heather investigate the drug cartel case, as she is being overly cautious due to her past experiences with betrayal and the death of her former partner, Chance.

1. Lily, Cane, and Tyler are at Jabot for a meeting about a fragrance campaign. Tyler and Lily get stuck in an elevator, and Tyler experiences a claustrophobic episode. Lily helps him through it by telling him a story about a spaceship.
2. Neil and Leslie are on a date and discussing Neil's return to Jabot. Leslie reveals that she and Tyler had a difficult childhood with an abusive father and moved away to start new lives.
3. Fenmore is accused of pushing Jamie off of a roof, and Michael and Lauren are trying to get to the bottom of what happened. Jamie is hesitant to talk about it, but eventually reveals that Fenmore is responsible.
4. Cane visits Chelsea to discuss her designs, which he finds impressive. Chelsea's mother, Anita, encourages her to find a man to take her mind off of Adam while her divorce is pending. Anita suggests that Chelsea have a fling with Cane, but Chelsea is hesitant.

1. Nick, under Victor's guidance, has been buying up Jabot's debt with the intention of foreclosing and taking over the company.
2. Jack, as CEO of Jabot, has called an emergency meeting of the shareholders to discuss the situation.
3. Malcolm and Dru are having issues related to a paternity test result that has not yet been revealed.
4. Devon is upset with Lily for forgetting his birthday and not understanding his feelings of not belonging in the Winters family.
5. J.T. is worried about Mac spending time with Kevin Fisher, who bought her a dress and took her on a date.
6. Victor and Nick are in a meeting with the bankers who hold Jabot's debt, trying to convince them not to sell to Nick.
7. Jack has a plan to save Jabot by offering fair market value for newly-issued shares, amounting to a 51% ownership of the company, to Chancellor Industries.
8. Phyllis has figured out that Dru is hiding something related to a paternity test and is urging her to tell Malcolm the truth.
9. Nikki calls Victor to confirm the situation with Jabot's debt and he refuses to take her call, causing her to suspect that something is indeed happening.

1. Jack and Sharon are packing up boxes from the Abbott mansion, as Jack has been forced to split the furnishings with Gloria due to the court's decision. Gloria is excited about the mansion being hers, but Kevin and Jana decline her invitation to a celebratory party, causing Gloria to feel lonely and long for her late husband, John.
2. At Jabot, Victoria and Adam are in disagreement over the choice of spokesperson for Beauty of Nature. Victoria thinks the chosen spokesperson is too young, while Adam argues that teens spend a lot of money on makeup and skin care. They are at an impasse and decide to call Victor to make a decision, but Adam reveals that Victor is in Los Angeles for a meeting.
3. Victor is visiting an art exhibition with Sabrina, admiring various pieces and discussing their merits. Sabrina expresses her admiration for Victor's strength and determination, which he appreciates. They continue to bond over their shared appreciation for art.

1. The body found in the Athletic Club basement has been identified as Adam Newman through DNA testing. The family will be contacted to make arrangements once the medical examiner releases the body.
2. The investigation is being treated as a homicide, and a search warrant is served at the Newman ranch and surrounding estate. The police are looking for a murderer.
3. Nick Newman has blood on his jacket, and Phyllis is concerned about it. She asks Sharon for help in getting rid of the jacket in case the blood is Adam's.
4. Patty Williams announces to Jack Abbott that she is pregnant with his child. Jack is surprised and hesitant to react, causing Patty to feel hurt.
5. Lauren Fenmore is kidnapped and being held captive by Ryder Callahan and Daisy Carter. She tries to appeal to Ryder's sense of family and asks him to let Jana go.
6. Victor Newman is questioned about a monogrammed handkerchief found in Adam's throat. The handkerchief is traced back to a Seville row haberdasher in London and has Jack Abbott's initials on it.
7. Abby Newman meets Ryder Callahan at a secluded location and shares her family problems with him. Ryder reveals that he comes from a messed-up family as well.
8. Lauren Fenmore believes that Sheila Carter is behind her kidnapping and confronts her, but instead, Sarah Smythe appears.

1. Genevieve is getting ready to fly to Las Vegas to marry Jack, but she is hesitant due to some unfinished business she needs to take care of. Jack is worried she won't show up, but Genevieve assures him she will be there.
2. Chelsea reveals to Victor that she is pregnant with Billy's child and plans to give the baby to him and Victoria to raise. Victor had hired Chelsea to seduce Billy and get incriminating photos, but the pregnancy was not part of the plan. Victor fires Chelsea and tells her to leave town.
3. Michael and Lauren are in Canada visiting their son Fen, who is living with his brother while Daisy serves parole. Michael thinks it's time for Fen to come home, but Lauren is hesitant due to Daisy's presence. Michael and Lauren get into an argument about Daisy and her influence on their son.

1. Victor Newman is investigating how Genevieve Atkinson was able to purchase the cosmetics company Beauty of Nature, as he suspects her ex-husband may have provided the funds. Genevieve insists that her purchase was legal and aboveboard, but Victor is concerned about the Securities and Exchange Commission (S.E.C.) investigating the sale.
2. Michael Baldwin is trying to help Victor keep the S.E.C. out of the sale, but he has not yet made the necessary call to a commissioner. Victor is frustrated by Michael's lack of progress and urges him to make the call immediately.
3. Lauren Fenmore has been arrested for assault with a deadly weapon after pulling a gun on Daisy Carter. Jill Abbott calls Michael Baldwin for help, and he and Avery Clark head to the police station to assist Lauren.
4. Neil Winters and Harmony Hamilton have been pretending to have a falling-out in order to avoid suspicion from the S.E.C. However, Harmony has become frustrated with Neil's involvement in Devon's life and has decided to end their relationship.
5. Tucker McCall has been working with the S.E.C. to trap Adam Newman, and Genevieve Atkinson approaches him with a proposition. She offers him a percentage of the sale of Beauty of Nature if he will say that he loaned her the money to make the purchase. Tucker is hesitant to lie to the feds, but Genevieve insists that it will be a generous percentage.

1. Jack, Amber, and Phyllis give Nick and Phyllis a gift for their anniversary, which turns out to be a treasure hunt. The final clue leads to a picture of their wedding night, when Phyllis was stuck in jail.
2. Victor approves of Adam's acquisition of a natural cleaning products company, despite Victoria's objections. She feels that Victor values Adam's opinion more than hers.
3. Amber tells Daniel about the news of Cane and Lily's baby, but Kay informs her that Lily lost the baby. Daniel is unsure of how to comfort Lily and Amber suggests that they not say anything.
4. Lily is determined to return to work and modeling, despite Cane's concerns. She has a photo shoot scheduled and is excited to get back to work.
5. Gloria confronts Jeffrey about him staying with Jill, but he insists that they are just friends. Alistair is also trying to find out information about Jeffrey for Gloria.
6. Jack tells Sharon about Jeffrey's request for Gloria to move into the pool house. Sharon is against the idea and Jack agrees.
7. Phyllis receives a drawing from her daughter, which turns out to be a clue for a treasure hunt for their anniversary. The final clue leads to a picture of their family.
8. Victoria is avoiding dinner with Victor and suggests that he ask Adam instead. Adam is enjoying his job and Victor notes that Victoria seems to be avoiding him.

1. Ricky Williams, son of Paul Williams, is struggling with resentment and anger issues. He has inherited these traits from his mother, who is mentally unstable and blames others for her problems. Ricky has written a card to someone, pretending it is from his mother, but Paul finds out and confronts Ricky about it. Ricky admits that he wrote the card himself to get sympathy, and he plans to bring Phyllis down using every trick in the book.
2. Lauren Fenmore is in legal trouble due to a shooting incident. Michael Baldwin, her lawyer, brings in Avery Clark to help with the case. Avery is able to negotiate a plea deal with the prosecutor, Walsh, who is still holding a grudge against Michael for helping Victor Newman. Jill Fenmore, Lauren's sister, is reluctant to testify against her sister and suggests that Michael's wife, Lauren's daughter, take over the family business while Lauren is in prison.
3. Phyllis Summers and Nick Newman are getting married and expecting a baby. Phyllis tells her son, Daniel, about the pregnancy, and he is happy for her. Daniel has some news for Phyllis as well - he is getting married to Daisy Carter. Daniel wants to elope with Daisy, but Phyllis is hesitant about the idea.
4. Billy Abbott and his mother, Jill, get into a physical altercation with Genevieve Atkinson, Cane Ashby's mother, at the Abbott mansion. Genevieve accuses Jill of being a bad mother, and Jill throws a glass of wine in Genevieve's face. Billy and Cane break up the fight, and Jill leaves for Australia. Genevieve receives a phone call from Colin, who has been released from prison thanks to her.

1. Michael is trying to make amends with Lauren by giving her a designer necklace from Forrester Creations and planning a special evening for her. However, Lauren is still upset with Michael for not communicating with her for several days.
2. Daniel has decided to leave Genoa City because he feels like he has messed up everyone's lives, including his own and Lily's. Lily tries to convince him that he is not a screw-up and that she believes in him.
3. Phyllis asks Drucilla for some time off from work to deal with Daniel's legal issues. Drucilla agrees but warns Phyllis that she needs her back soon. Cassie starts to remember bits and pieces of the night of the accident and realizes that she was driving the car when it crashed.

1. Sharon and Nick have a conversation about how the anniversary of Cassie's death is affecting them. Sharon mentions that she has been feeling a "strange, cloudy, sort of numb feeling" and Nick reassures her that keeping her emotions at a distance isn't always a bad thing.
2. Phyllis calls Nick to come to the penthouse because Summer and her friends are having a party with alcohol. Nick is upset with Summer for lying to him and takes away her car keys for a month.
3. Michael and Lauren are dealing with the aftermath of Fenmore getting into a fight with Kyle over Summer. Michael is upset with Fenmore for his actions and Lauren tries to diffuse the situation.
4. Sharon has a therapy session with Dr. Watkins and discusses her feelings of loneliness and her desire to be in love. She mentions that Adam has been a good support system for her, but she is unsure of his feelings towards her.
5. Nick and Phyllis have a conversation about Summer and her desire to experience life and make her own decisions. Nick is still hesitant to let Summer make her own mistakes and Phyllis tries to convince him to loosen the reins.
6. Kyle talks to Jack about his feelings for Summer and Jack expresses his concerns about Nick's opposition to their relationship.
7. Summer talks to Courtney about the party and how Kyle stood up to her dad for her. She mentions that Kyle wants to date her and she is excited about the possibility.
8. Phyllis talks to Nick about being the "nice mommy" and trying to talk down the mean dad. She expresses her support for Summer and her desire to experience life. Nick is still hesitant to let Summer make her own mistakes.

1. Chloe has been struggling with the loss of her daughter Delia and has been pushing Kevin away. However, after Kevin finds her at the movies, she expresses her desire to get real help and Kevin reassures her of his love and support.
2. Ian Ward has been released from charges and is now in Genoa City. Dylan and Nikki are upset about this, but Paul advises them to not engage with him as it will only make the situation worse. Victor, however, has other plans and is determined to take matters into his own hands.

1. Nick is talking to his deceased daughter, Cassie, as if she is really there. He apologizes for not being there for her and for letting her go out the night she died.
2. Cassie appears to Nick as a teenager, and they discuss a specific night when Nick and Sharon decided not to let Cassie go to a party. Nick thinks that if he had kept her home that night, she would still be alive.
3. Cassie tells Nick that he needs to stop blaming himself for her death and start living his life again. She reminds him that no one's life is perfect and that he needs to figure out what he wants and go for it.
4. Nick reflects on how his family has fallen apart since Cassie's death. He feels responsible for the tension between Sharon and Brad, and for the distance that has grown between him and Sharon.
5. Cassie tells Nick that Sharon needs to feel close to her, and that Nick should not take that away from her. She reminds him that Sharon was not completely alone after Cassie's death, and that she had people to help her through it.
6. Nick and Cassie watch as Sharon and Brad comfort each other after a difficult day. Cassie reminds Nick that Sharon needs to feel close to her, and that he should not take that away from her.
7. Nick reflects on how his actions have affected his family. He realizes that he has pushed Sharon away and that he needs to start being there for her and for his son.
8. Cassie encourages Nick to start living his life again and to figure out what he wants. She reminds him that he has the power to change his life and to make it better.
9. Nick decides to move back home and to be there for his family. He realizes that he needs to start living his life again and to be there for the people he loves.
1. Michael and Lauren discuss

1. Devon paid off Elena's student loans without her knowledge, causing her to feel like he was disrespecting her independence. They both made mistakes in how they handled the situation, but they are willing to talk it out and move forward.
2. Kevin has been keeping Chloe in hiding and kidnapped Phyllis to trade for her. However, Phyllis escaped and Adam is demanding proof that Kevin followed through on their deal before he releases Chloe.
3. Adam is suing Nick for full custody of Christian and Nick is seeking Michael's help to fight against it. Adam has hired the best lawyers money can buy and is willing to fight for as long as it takes.

1. Kevin announces to his family that he is moving to Portland, Oregon with his daughter Bella for a fresh start. He had been thinking about it for weeks and felt a sense of calm when he visited the city. His family is concerned about him uprooting Bella and moving so far away, but Kevin believes it will be good for both of them.
2. Sharon receives a job offer from Chelsea to return to work at Chelsea 2.0 part-time, full-time, or any extra hours she has to spare. Sharon is flattered but declines the offer due to her other commitments.
3. Nikki is preparing for her benefit concert to raise money for M.S. Research. Victor is putting on the event to show his admiration for Nikki's determination to overcome her M.S. Nick is concerned that his mother is not interested in performing and is avoiding the stress of the event.
4. Abby and Scott are working together to prepare for the concert. Abby mentions that there seems to be tension between Victor and Nick and that the Newman family has been distant lately. Victor confirms that he has noticed this as well and expresses his desire for the family to be close again.

1. Jack and Sharon are discussing Sharon's work schedule for a promotional tour when Sharon reveals that Nicholas has not returned any of her calls and she doesn't know where he is.
2. Colleen is tired and not feeling well, and Lily notices that her husband is missing from home again. Colleen wonders what's going on with him and Lily reassures her that JT will figure everything out.
3. Daniel and Kevin are discussing a tape that Alex has, which contains their voices and could potentially be used to extort them. They are trying to come up with a plan to get the tape and pay off Alex.
